name: Grand Cross: Age of Titans
description:
The mysterious world of Skyna is engulfed in the chaos of darkness. Become the one who will save the world!
From customized troops, real-time controls, and special troops that can rain down fire from the sky, to tide-turning Liege Skills and ultimate mecha weapons called Titans, the battlefields of Skyna are varied and unpredictable.

name: Duke Nukem Forever: Restoration Project
description: The DNF2001 Restoration Project was created roughly a day or two after the August 21, 2001 and October 26, 2001 versions of Duke Nukem Forever; dated a whole 10 years before the release of the final game, were leaked by x0r_jmp on the /v/ board of 4chan. This resulted in a flurry of renewed interest in Duke and the game itself; and quickly attracted both vets and new blood alike interested in modifying the game's source code.

name: Manga-Ka Debut Monogatari DS: Akogare! Manga Ka Ikusei Game
description: Manga Ka Debut Monogatari DS: Akogare! Manga Ka Ikusei Game is a Simulation game, developed by Hyde and published by TDK Core, which was released in Japan in 2005.

name: Darkest Room
description: Boom compatible (cl9) single level for Doom 2. Tech-bases installed into black, gray and green caverns. This map is designed to be difficult (harder then my previous maps). I suggest to start on HMP and, eventually, give UV a try when you know well the map.

name: Silver Edge
description: Two Boom compatible (cl9) levels for Doom 2. Quite challenging maps on UV (harder then Plutonia maps on skill 4), more manageable on lower skill settings. It features the low life Cybers Ribbiks created, which have 700 hp in this wad (a full credit list of the resources used is present in the text file). Cooperative gameplay is implemented.

name: Brave Bow Archer: Princess Rescue Simulator!
description: The princess is in danger! Archer, shoot the rope and save the princess! Demonstrate your accuracy skills and complete the puzzle with real physics!

name: Pipe Dream
description: This 2D platform game where we manage our little character will make you feel different from the platform games you know!

name: Satay Shop Tycoon
description: Grow your satay business and become the most successful satay entrepreneur in the world!

name: Tow Truck Driver Simulator 2023
description: Become the hero of the city's roads, rescue stranded vehicles, and prove yourself as the best tow truck driver in town!

name: Space Cowboys: Riders of the Storm
description: Embark on a cosmic journey! Choose your role: Pilot, Engineer, First Mate, or Commando. Conquer the stars with intense teamplay, powerful upgrades, and thrilling battles. Take command, repair systems, or unleash chaos. Victory awaits in this immersive space adventure!

name: Chainsaw Man: Nusunda Baiku De Kirihiraku!!
description: Chainsaw Man: Nusunda Baiku De Kirihiraku!! is a mobile browser game based on the Chainsaw Man series. The game was made to promote volume 15 of the manga.

name: Conundrum 929
description: Conundrum 929 imitates an online internet mystery inspired by the likes of Cicada3301. It features a replica of a browser that allows you to navigate between different internet pages just like in reality. An elaborate hint system gives everyone the opportunity to experience a true internet mystery.

name: Adventure of the Skullmancer
description: "Adventure of the Skullmancer" is a Rogue-Like action game where players take on the role of a skeleton mage who ventures into an underground world, encounters companions, summons amusing skeletons, and battles enemies. Ultimately, they unravel the mysteries of this enigmatic world.

name: Sengoku Dynasty: Ultimate Edition
description: The Ultimate Edition of Sengoku Dynasty contains everything you need to survive in the harsh times of feudal Japan. The soothing soundtrack helps you to relax while the official guide will lead you to victory.

name: Quake II: Call of the Machine
description: A brand-new Quake II experience from MachineGames consisting of 28 campaign levels and one multiplayer deathmatch map. In the depths of Strogg space lies the Machine, a singularity capable of collapsing the fabric of reality. Fight across time and space to find the Strogg-Maker, destroy it, and change the destiny of man and machine.

name: My New Classmate is a Dragon?!
description:
From average guy to wizard-in-training—your life gets flipped upside down after you save the life of a stranger on your way home, and now you’re the master of a dragon girl who has sworn eternal loyalty to you! Things don’t slow down there though, as you soon find out you’re actually a wizard, and you’ve been invited to Deagon Academy to hone your budding magic skills.

You may be new to the world of magic, but with three beautiful classmates cheering you on, how could you fail? The true question is, which one of these girls gets a ‘pass’ from you?

name: Procambarus Fallax
description: This is a visual novel game featuring toxic wave of electricity with a gameplay duration of 5-10 minutes. You will spend some bedtime moments with your “best friend” that can be either enjoyable or less pleasant. Will you take the medicine?

name: The Hidden Fragmentation
description: Explore a half-abandoned complex in the middle of the desert, meet strange characters and discover the mysterious Fragmentation.

name: Super Mario World: The Princess Rescue 3 - The Turnabout
description:
This hack is a direct sequel to the hacks SMW The Princess Rescue (released 2017) and SMW The Princess Rescue 2:Luigi's Journey(2019).
In those two hacks Mario and Luigi both went simultaneously in their own adventures to save their beloved Princess Peach and Daisy from the clutches of Bowser and Tatanga.

At the end of their adventures both went on a honeymoon with their Princesses and here is where SMWTPR3 start.

This time around the Princesses will finally have their time to shine in this role-reversal SMW hack where you play as Princess Peach and Daisy going into a mission to rescue their beloved plumbers.

This hack has:
- 88 new levels with 120 exits to find
- Custom graphics (mostly similar or in SMW artstyle)
- Custom music
- Custom sprites and bosses
- A new powerup
- Lots of ASM
- English and Brazilian Portuguese localization
and more.

name: Chaos CompleXX
description: A junk hack made by FPI. This hack includes loads of glitches, horrible palettes, bad level design, message boxes filled with a bunch of junk messages, and bad grammar.

name: Yump
description: The year is 2017. the war between aesthetics and level design rages on. cities have collapsed, buildings burned. but from the wake of this destruction comes a guiding light: Yump. Yump is a love letter to 2008 romhacks that protonjon or azureblade would've played, and is the hotly anticipated sequel to Jump.

name: Moémon: Heart of Gold
description: Moémon: Heart of Gold is a ROM hack based on the Heart Gold Version. What sets it apart from the original is the concept design.

name: As Planned
description: "As Planned" is a puzzle game in which players give a limited number of instructions to a slime that repeats the same movement to move boxes to specified positions.

name: Tilted
description: Tilted is a psychedelic platformer with abstract visuals, accessible to all fans of the genre. There is no health or lives to worry about, only time, as you slowly ascend to unknown heights. Don't go too fast though, or you may fall and be set back! This game was made with speed running in mind...

name: Life's Too Short GB
description:
A spooky, charming, homebrew adventure!

In Life's Too Short GB, you take on the role of a celestial problem-solver as you're tasked with repairing a rift between two vampires who have dramatically fallen out and confined themselves to their respective coffins...

You'll need to explore the mansion, meet various spooky characters and solve simple puzzles in order to put the mansion back together and mend the rift in the vampires' relationship!

name: Ping Pong Deluxe
description: Ping Pong Deluxe immerses you in a world of table tennis that revolutionizes the classic game with new modes and different maps! Here you get fast-paced rallies and dynamic gameplay that will keep you enthralled. Become the undisputed table tennis champion!

name: Awakened
description: The world has never been the same ever since the outbreak happened.

name: Garten of Banban 5
description: Enter Banban's Kindergarten, and you're sure to make some friends. Explore the mysterious establishment and don't lose your life and sanity. Uncover the horrifying truth behind the place, but be careful, as you are far from alone…

name: Garten of Banban 6
description: Explore the forgotten levels of Banban’s Kindergarten. Survive the new terrors that reside below. Uncover the truth behind the place, and find the whereabouts of your missing child…

name: Hardfest
description: Greetings mortals, Hardfest is a community project that is an homage to the Slaughterfest saga, not fully focused on slaughter maps this time, but hard maps in general. To that end, we've got a range of maps for you - ranging in style from small, tight combat puzzles to expansive slaughtermaps. There's also a puzzle map and a platforming map thrown in for good measure.

name: Escape Simulator: Portal Escape Chamber
description:
Explore the detailed environment of the mysterious subdivision of Aperture Science Laboratories!

Solve perplexing new puzzles and devices, in this content packed escape-room!

Working in a laboratory requires the correct gear! Put on your brand new Aperture Science lab coat and start exploring!

name: Mystic Messenger: Ray's After Ending
description: DLC that can be played regardless of progress in Ray's route. Takes place two weeks after Ray's good ending.

name: Mystic Messenger: Bad Jumin & After
description: DLC that unlocks after completing Jumin's Bad Story Ending 2. This DLC takes place two months after his bad story ending.

name: Super Mario Infinity 2: The Cursed Gem
description:
Picking up directly from where the romhack "Super Mario Infinity" left off, Mario and Luigi have discovered an artifact called the Cursed Gem that contains a timed explosive supposedly able to destroy the world, and the only way to stop it is to enter the Gem itself. The adventure heats up when our heroes learn of Bowser's presence in the artifact, and as they search the Gem and discover its underground secrets, ancient clues and revelations begin to make themselves known. Could all of the answers be at hand? Only time will tell (literally) if our heroes can stop the time bomb, or if their planet is doomed to an explosive death...

This hack contains 114 exits.

name: Perish: Exodus
description: Face the new challenges of Perish: Exodus a completely free content update that exists alongside the main campaign, on June 28th. Turn your back briefly on Elysium to explore the Winds of the Anemoi: four unexplored realms filled with terrific remixes and augmentations of existing weapons, fiendish enemies and boss fights that are even bigger and more devilish than those in the main campaign.

name: Oddsparks: An Automation Adventure
description: Design automated workshops for your odd and adorable Sparks to carry and craft everything, including more of themselves! Lead your squad of Sparks into combat. Explore a strange fantasy world, in single player or online co-op. Unearth the ancient mystery of the Sparks!

name: South Park: Snow Day!
description: Join Cartman, Stan, Kyle and Kenny, in three-dimensional glory, to celebrate the most magical day in any young child’s life - a snow day! Grab up to three friends and battle your way through the snow-piled streets of South Park on a quest to save the world and enjoy a day without school.

name: Titan Quest II
description: Nemesis, Goddess of Retribution, is out of control. She is corrupting the Threads of Fate and punishing all those who oppose her. Take up your weapon, fight alongside gods, and change fate itself in Titan Quest 2, an action RPG inspired by Greek mythology.

name: Corpse Party II: Darkness Distortion
description: Corpse Party II: Darkness Distortion follows three high school friends; Haruka Nanami, Nemu Takanashi, and Maria Hitsugi, as they explore the Amare Est Vivere Hospital, testing a local urban legend as the streamer Nemu seeks to boost her subscriber count. Unfortunately for the three girls, the legend of “Ayame’s Mercy” is true, and they trigger a decades-old curse that sends them into a dark realm. Together they must avoid the vengeful spirit of Ayame Kirishima and other horrors from the hospital’s dark past as they search for a way to dispel Ayame’s curse once and for all.

name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: The Last Ronin
description:
Who is the Last Ronin? In a future, battle-ravaged New York City, a lone surviving Turtle embarks on a seemingly hopeless mission seeking justice for the family he lost.

From the minds of the creators of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles, and based on the best-selling comic book event by Eastman, Waltz, Bishop, Delgado, and the Escorza Brothers: the official video game adaptation of TMNT: The Last Ronin.

name: American Truck Simulator: Nebraska
description: Located in the heart of the Great Plains, Nebraska’s vast and diverse landscape consists of prairies, rolling hills, and the crucial Platte River. While hauling cargo through the Cornhusker State along historic routes, you will have many opportunities to witness iconic landmarks and truly immerse yourself in the state's spirit, from its pioneer history to the modern energy of cities full of ever-growing industries. Our goal is for the DLC to offer a fusion of peaceful landscapes and the rhythm of a buzzing economy that's unlike any other.

name: Doodle World: Redrawn
description: Doodle World Redrawn is new, never before released, re-imagining of Doodle World with tougher levels, enemies, and bosses! Use the new double jump ability to navigate through these tougher levels. "Kids Mode" is still available in this new version, so even younger players can enjoy this new game!

name: Haunted Hotel XVI: Beyond the Page - Collector's Edition
description: Travel to spooky hotel to track down a horror writer whose inventions might just be leaping off the page!

name: Sea of Treasures
description: Sea of Treasures is an exciting 2D platformer that takes you on an epic adventure through multiple islands in search of the legendary treasure map. Embark on a thrilling journey, explore and overcome treacherous obstacles while gathering the pieces of the legendary treasure map.

name: One Life Clicker
description: A unique idle clicker game with RPG elements and hardcore survival mode with only one life available

name: Let's Sing 2024
description: Let’s Sing 2024 brings a thrilling new karaoke experience to your living room. Enjoy chartbreaking hits and all-time classics that are guaranteed to make you sing at the top of your lungs. Step into the spotlight with the brand new career mode and rise to stardom. Become a VIP and test your vocal range with many more songs online. Experience seasonal events online with Let's Sing Fest and join the never-ending karaoke party alone or with friends while you play with people across the globe.

name: Pinball Kingdom
description:
Pinball Kingdom this is a combo of popular arcade game and the Tower Defense.

You know the rules! Use your flippers to destroy enemy buildings and defense your kingdom. You play like a regular pinball, but the goal is different. You must defend your kingdom against a pinball ball and destroy enemy buildings using the same ball. The Pinball Kingdom game starts with a very simple kingdom, but you can upgrade it to become a very defensive one. In Pinball Kingdom season one, players play versus humans, but in season two we plan to add Orcs, Monsters, new bosses with skills, more kingdoms, and balls with passive effects.

name: My Hunting Adventure Time
description: My Hunting Adventure Time Remake is an adult visual novel that is currently in its developmental stages but is very playable. The main story will undergo updates over time. Our goal is to present our players a story and gameplay that exceeds other visual novels.

name: My Camp of Memories: Episode 1
description: Visual novel in the genre of romance and adventure. You are eighteen years old, and you have just entered the last stage of education. However, strange fragments of memories, notes and a series of events say that it will not work out to study calmly. The path you take is entirely in your hands.

name: Witching Hour
description: Witching Hour is a zombie wave shooter where you have to survive until the clock strikes 12. You are trapped inside the house while hordes of zombies attack you from every angle. Can YOU survive until witching hour?

name: Power Slap
description:
Power Slap is a thrilling turn-based fighting game that brings all the fun and satisfaction of a virtual slap contest to your pocket. This game is designed to test your timing, precision, and strategy skills with playful humor.
Step into the arena, rise through the ranks, and become the undisputed PowerSlap Champion!

name: Starfighter Overkill
description:
Starfighter Overkill is an intense space shoot-em-up with unlimited waves of non-stop adrenaline pumping action.
Blast away waves of alien spaceships, star panzers, destroyers and space fighters before facing the big bosses.
Collect power-ups to upgrade your firepower. Use special weapons to quickly annihilate hordes of enemies.
Boost your adrenaline by killing enemies and use the powerful air strike to blitz the enemy in a torrent of destruction.

name: Calming Lia
description:
Help Bao to calm Lia with her nightmares and save the dream! Calming Lia is a glamorous match 3 adventure game.
Travel through fun worlds, Deep Sea, Spooky Circus and much more in this glamorous match 3 adventure of Lia’s dreams. Slide and match 3 or more to save Lia’s dreams! Beat challenging match 3 levels and relax your mind. Collect magic charms, beautiful diamonds and shiny gold!

name: Angle.
description: Angle. is based on reflection mechanics. The main aim is to hit all white figures in the level.

name: Family in Puzzle House
description:
Welcome to Family in Puzzle House!
Sophie, a mischievous young girl, lost her key while she was playing in a room of the House.
Now the key is hidden, lost somewhere among the objects in the room.
Please help poor little Sophie find her key!
Find new and useful items in the various characters’ rooms as you search to see where the key is hiding.
If you don’t know how to use an item, check out the hint!
It’ll really help you in finding the key.

name: Jump Room
description: Avoid the spikes and collect dots to score points by jumping up and falling down. How many points can you score?

name: Summer Party Time + Survival Pack Set
description:
We've got a huge collection of games with controls so simple anyone can enjoy!
There are plenty of intuitive and easy-to-play minigames for everyone!
Enjoy finding your new favorite!
Party on with the Summer Party Time and Survival Pack Bundle!

name: Gauntler
description: Avoid numerous dangers using the power of Mystical Gauntlets and make your way to the summit, braving increasingly harder challenges.

name: Pumpkin Hell
description: Have a spooky map anyways. This was originally mapped for Pigeon Speedmapping Session hosted by Bonnie, but I wanted to flesh the concept out into a more substantial map. This should take you about 10 to 20 minutes. Par time for the original was 2:00, for reference.

name: Safe Haven
description: "Safe Haven" is my interpretation of a safe place removed from the world of the living - it's not necessarily heaven, but a happy place nonetheless. All souls are welcome. Negative influences are buried here. Your stay may be temporary, or permanent - that's up to you.

name: Ode to the Odonata
description:
A quick semi-speedmap made for @Dragonfly's birthday! Inspired greatly by his "Order of the Odonata" map from a few years back.

Simply collect the three teal skulls to open the exit. Blind playthrough probably takes about 20 minutes.

name: Exquisite Amethyst
description:
Here is a new single map for GZDoom, inspired an inordinate amount by Cyb's "Void".

Ambition outgrew the time allotted before Fuzzball's birthday, so it was released 2 weeks late.

name: Gloombase
description: "Gloombase" is a love letter to early 2000s ZDoom mapping, employing linear, objective-based gameplay, and abundant use of ZDoom features such as slopes, colored lighting, ambient sounds, lightning and weather effects, and a LOT of scripted sequences including interactable NPCs and menus. It is also a teaser for something bigger still to come. Stay tuned!

name: Flashback to Hell
description: A 15-level mapset for DOOM 2 that is compatible with the "-complevel 9" setting. Features new music by PRIMEVAL and James Paddock, as well as high-quality redone sound effects by Per Kristian Risvik. If the new music tracks are buggy in ZDOOM while using FMOD, updating to the latest non-official revision might fix the problem. I recommend using Fluidsynth, though. The first eleven maps are tech-base themed and are re-imaginings of the first eleven maps of Doom II. The next three maps are hell-themed, with the fifteenth map serving as an epilogue. There are two bonus Wolfenstein 3D themed levels in the two secret map slots, accessible via the epilogue.

name: Death's Dichotomy
description: Death's Dichotomy is 5 maps by 4 mappers for GZDoom. This is an offshoot of the now cancelled Near Death Experiences project. The aim of the project is to explore ideas and thoughts on death and dying.

name: Demonastery
description: A medium sized, architecturally detailed single-player map which twists back in on itself several times, set in a crumbling monastery made of marble and corpses.

name: Micro Olympics
description:
Will you be the champion of Micro-Olympics?
Shoot your plane as far as you can.
Buy and carefully use power-ups on your way to the top.
Try to beat all 7 glorious pilots in this fast paced game…

name: Preacher
description: Preacher is a 10-level PWAD for Doom II requiring a Boom-compatible source port. It was released by Darch in December 2018 and is a "musical conversion" based around medieval Christianity. Some music is provided by the band Those Poor Bastards.

name: World Soccer Champs
description: Get ready for an exhilarating soccer experience in this addictive mobile game. Manage your team and strive for greatness as you participate in numerous football leagues and cups from around the globe, including local clubs and national teams.

name: Into Hell
description: Into Hell is intended to be an episode of levels that take you deeper and deeper underground, until you find a crack in the Earth and dive into the realm itself.

name: Coffee Break
description:
Started in 2009-ish, Coffee Break was intended to be another 32 map megawad. Unfortunately, due to a busy schedule, laziness, and other excuses, I didn't finish it. But I do have 11 maps, so there's that.

Submitted for your approval are 11 short maps designed to challenge all sorts of Doomers. All were made with lots of tender love and care, and with pistol starts in mind.

name: The Warlock's Hearth
description: The Warlock's Hearth is a very large map for limit-removing ports with an emphasis on atmosphere, exploration and enjoyable fights that still challenge the player without putting the pressure on all the time. The map features an .ogg soundtrack courtesy of Der Wolfmensch (Marco from Decoded Feedback's sideproject).

name: Scourge of Viscerus
description: Scourge of Viscerus is 7-level hub-based mod for Hexen. It was created by Matt Tropiano (MTrop) and released on July 1, 2010. Set several years after the defeat of the Deathkings, the players must venture out to stop a demon named Viscerus, who seeks to resurrect them in order to conquer the world of Cronos. Scourge of Viscerus features new boss enemies and new music tracks.

name: Elf Gets Pissed
description: An episode 1 replacement for Heretic.

name: The Realm of Parthoris
description: The Realm of Parthoris is an episode one replacement for Heretic, created in 2015 by the Doomworld community, led by Jeff King (Egregor). It requires a limit-removing port that also features Heretic support to play. Development began on January 27, 2015, with the aim of creating a full Heretic megawad, but due to a lack of interest from mappers, the project was scaled down to a single episode

name: Theorists
description:
Welcome to my game, buddy!

Matt is glad to see you! He waited a long time for someone to visit him! Feel like at home and get ready for endless theories!

This game is a parody of the Mr. TomatoS game based on the intro of an Game Theory video. It's not meant to make fun of the original, it's just a silly fan game.

name: LightSprites
description:
Rain colorful orbs across the land to sprout happy little dancing people and animals.

It's kind of like the Disney World ride "It's a Small World" combined with crack.

name: Super Alicorn Sisters: Return of the Tantabus
description: After the Tantabus, the dream monster that threatened to turn Equestria into a living nightmare, was defeated, Princess Luna thought she could finally sleep peacefully, but it turns out that the Tantabus wasn't actually defeated. Parts of it escaped into the real world, and the parts have been giving ponies all over Equestria nightmares. Can Celestia and Luna venture across Equestria, destroy the Tantabus particles, and save everypony before it's too late?

name: Afflicted
description: Afflicted is a thrilling post-apocalyptic shooter with exciting game modes and a cheesy storyline.

name: Venture's Gauntlet VR
description: Venture's Gauntlet VR is a thrilling, immersive adventure game set in breathtaking landscapes. Test your stamina, accuracy, wit and reflexes as you navigate treacherous terrain, solve puzzles, and navigate obstacles. So get ready to embark on the adventure of a lifetime!

name: Mutus Meteora
description: A virtual gallery where players can explore the highlands, its architecture, discover works of art, collectibles, interact with a third-person character, and adjust the time of day.

name: Momodora 0: Day of Birth
description: Momodora 0: Day of Birth is a small, silly Momodora fangame made as a birthday present for the creator of the Momodora series.

name: Thomas The Tank Engine & Friends
description: Thomas The Tank Engine & Friends was an educational video game based on the television series of the same name. It was planned for a 1999 release date but was cancelled for unknown reasons.

name: Everlasting Flowers
description: Everlasting Flowers is the first installment in a series of "cinematic novels" that tells the story of two girls, Mina and Ran, and their struggles and growth as they search for their own approach to life.

name: KINDa
description: It has been designed for old-school, single player and cooperative play. There are 32 maps and the themes really vary.

name: Does it Stack?
description: "Does it Stack?" is a physics-based VR puzzle game with an explosive twist. It has a twenty levels each with three challenges and a sandbox mode to explore.

name: Mia's Hunt
description: Survive the horrors of 'Mia's Hunt: Forest of Fear' as 18-year-old Mia fights through a zombie-infested forest. Arm yourself, and escape the nightmare.

name: Suwako-chan Cubic
description: Suwako-chan Cubic is a Touhou fangame featuring a unique take on the Touhou formula, featuring 3D movement and attack patterns for the titular protagonist to get through. Sequel to Suwako no Danmaku Pyonpyon Daisansaku.

name: Mueitou: Shinsou-hen
description: Sin descripción

name: Mah Jongg: V-G-A
description:
"Mah Jongg -V-G-A- is a high-tech simulation of the ancient Chinese game of Mah Jongg. Some historians date Mah Jongg back to the time of Confucius -- over 25 centuries ago!

It's believed that sailors and fishermen played Mah Jongg as a diversion from the monotony of their long voyages. The game was originally played with cards, but eventually bone and bamboo tiles were substituted since these were less likely to be blown off the deck.

Mah Jongg -V-G-A- recreates the beauty and addictive pleasure of Mah Jongg, but uses modern data processing techniques and high-resolution graphics instead of bamboo tiles.

In an attempt to make this game as elegant and as enjoyable as possible, the author has used some of the most advanced features of today's state-of-the-art MS-DOS computers. Not all PC computers are able to run Mah Jongg -V-G-A-. But if yours can, prepare yourself for the meeting of the past and future!!!"

name: Hardy Boyz Stunt Challenge
description: Sin descripción

name: Escape Basement
description: You wake up in a dark and damp basement with no memory of who you are or how you got there. You hear moans and groans from behind the locked door. You realize you are not alone. You find a flashlight and a shotgun on the floor. You have to find a way out before the zombies break in and devour you.

name: Gunship
description:
Our nation is under attack by enemy forces and the defense can only succeed with the help of air ground support. The future of our nation depends on you! Fight your way through five missions to repel the attack and restore peace.

Gunship is a rail shooter for the Nintendo Game Boy. Fight your way through five action-packed missions as you try to repel the attack and restore peace.

name: Filler
description: In Filler, your goal is simple: fill 2/3 of the level. To create a filler ball, press down. It will grow until you release the mouse button, it hits another filler ball, or a bouncing ball runs into it.

name: Treasure of Cutlass Reef
description: In Treasure of Cutlass Reef, the player takes control of a pirate ship as they battle through twelve stages and a seemingly unending armada, to reach Cutlass Reef and claim the buried treasure. There are three difficulty levels in all, each with their own varying degree of difficulty. Each stage contains a certain number of enemy ships (usually about a half a dozen to begin with) with the last ship being a flagship, more powerful than the rest.

name: Shinjuku Soumei
description: Shinjuku Soumei is an upcoming visual novel from G-MODE and Plus81 that questions the value of life in a city where life and death intersect.

name: Cybrix
description: Play the racket game from the future in your living room today! Are you ready to break a sweat in this ball bouncing, brick smashing madness? Can you destroy every single brick by swinging the rackets, shooting laser guns and detonating explosive balls, all while dodging shrapnel, charging up the piercing ball and collecting power-ups? Compete against your friends on the global leaderboard in 50 different levels or try to get as far as you can in the endless mode (sweat towels are sold separately)! Can you smash them all?

name: Cute Fames Adventure
description: Cute Fames Adventure is an RPG game, more or less, where you play as this little creature that is called Fame, Fame is a normal looking humanoid creature that was turned into a dog by an experiment that only happened in their town. It is now your time to find out who did it and get him back to what he looked like!

name: SRG Mixtape Volume #4
description: Super Rare Mixtape Vol. 4 is a physical indie game collection including 30 games and 10 demos. Packaged as a USB drive shaped like cassette tape with only a limited number sold.

name: Teenage Demon Slayer Society
description: A turn-based character action game where the only thing harder than growing up, is cutting a demon in half next to the person you may or may not have a crush on. This is Teenage Demon Slayer Society.

name: Konjiki no Gash Bell!! Golden Memories
description: A Konjiki No Gash Bell (Zatch Bell) mobile card battle game.

name: Paranormal Syndrome: R Dolls Edition
description: A remake of the chapter 1 of the game Paranormal Syndrome, with changed graphics, menus and even some changes in the game mechanics.

name: Code.Zer0
description: Code.Zer0 is an educational project focused on the basic teaching of programming that was developed in the discipline of Projeto Integrado 1 of the Systems and Digital Media course where the client of the project was Professor George who required a game to be applied in the classroom.

name: Kikai: The Silent Cat
description: In a world of anthropomorphic animals, a ninja cat is imprisoned for his crimes of murder and fights to free himself.

name: Pushpully
description: Pushpully is a puzzle game where you try to reach the end of the level by changing your polarity and interacting with magnetic blocks around the levels.

name: Fruit Box
description: Fruit Box is a Web Game made in HTML5 where you drag the mouse to highlight a group of apples that add up to ten, try to get as many points as you can before the time runs out.

name: Splatt Curling
description: Splatt Curling was the game made in two days by Team 8 at Game Jam+.

name: CrazyTV
description: You just slept on the couch while watched some trash terror film. Now the monster wants to get you, in your dreams! Destroy the TV spirit and take back the control of your precious TV using your controller to destroy the monsters it summons.

name: Crusade to Die
description: Made in 2 days for the GMTK Game Jam 2022 with the theme Roll of the Dice. Lock onto tiles and move them around to help a little bard avoid skeletons and collect coins. Grab D6 to generate new tiles and D4 to reroll tiles. Getting hit will lose you tiles.

name: Gaia: A Protetora da Natureza
description:
Get ready to go on an adventure and help Gaia protect Planet Earth, which is being invaded by aliens with the ability to blend into the soil of the region where they landed.

Use your water and wind equipment, cause erosions on the enemies, and thus prevent them from destroying nature.

name: Circuit Breaker
description:
A pixel puzzle platformer game.

You play as a Robot called V1 to escape from the facility you currently trapped in.

The world is changing and you discover new paths as you explore this world to find your way out of this facility

name: LEGO Sonic the Hedgehog: Speed Sphere Challenge
description: Power through obstacles, bounce off walls, defeat Dr. Eggman and save the animals in trouble. Gotta go faster!

name: Neopets: The Altador Plot
description: The Altador Plot introduced to the main Neopets game the lost city of Altador. After its resurgence, none of the residents could remember about Altadorian history or why they kept hidden from Neopia. This plot serves as a prequel story to the PS2 game Neopets: The Darkest Faerie.

name: Sonic Golf
description: Sonic Golf is a mobile phone game released on the Sonic Cafe service offered by Sega.

name: Sonic the Hedgehog
description: Sonic the Hedgehog is a re-release of the 16-bit version of Sonic the Hedgehog (1991), released as part of the Sonic Cafe service offered by Sega. The game was created as part of the Sonic the Hedgehog series' 10th anniversary celebration, and was downloadable for free between 18 June and 31 July 2001.

name: Forget Your Chains
description:
Forget Your Chains is a visual psychological horror novel about the horrors of forgetting anti psychotics.

Play as Nonnie, a strange girl with schizoaffective disorder and try to make the right decisions for her survival. Explore her world, an empty home, through her eyes and mind. Interact with strange & surreal characters as you try to search for medication or try to create safety.

name: Speed
description: Speed is a mobile phone game released as part of the Sonic Cafe service offered by Sega.

name: Sonic Billiards
description: Sonic Billiards is a mobile phone game released as a part of the Sonic Cafe service offered by Sega.

description: Sonic Bowling is a bowling game for mobile phones that was released as a part of the Sonic Cafe service offered by Sega.

name: Eggman no Kazuate Panic!
description: Eggman no Kazuate Panic! is a mobile phone game released as part of the Sonic Cafe service offered by Sega.

name: Sonic no Jirai Sagashi Game
description: Sonic no Jirai Sagashi Game is a mobile phone game released as part of the Sonic Cafe service offered by Sega.

name: Sonic Darts

name: Speed DX
description: Speed DX is a mobile phone game released as part of the Sonic Cafe service offered by Sega and is a sequel of Speed.

name: Souls

name: More or Less
description: More or less is a browser based guessing game with several sub topics.

name: Enigmoon
description: Metroidvania with challenging puzzles and free exploration as long as you have oxygen.

name: Gears of Babies: Browser
description:
Gears of Babies : Browser is a fun third person shooter with an action hero baby protagonist.

The story of the game is about a baby who wants to take away his milk and diapers.

name: Good Job!
description: There's no real need to pretend and work anymore... Let's have some more fun and kill her.

name: Magicliment
description: In this real-time action adventure RPG, players set off as Pururin, a fledgling hero freshly graduated from the Hero's Academy. Jump, fight, and use magic to collect the seven Rainbow Fragments scattered across the world and prevent the Demon King's resurrection.

name: Pro Evolution Soccer Collection
description: Create an unbeatable team to call your own!

name: Something in the Woods
description:
Something In the Woods is a short horror game that places you in the shoes of a Police Officer on a fateful night. While driving down a desolate road, exhaustion compels you to stop at an isolated gas station for a cup of coffee. However, as you step inside, you look at a board with dozens missing person posters and wonder who or what could have done this. An eerie silence pervades the gas station, devoid of any staff or customers. You need to find out where everyone has gone.

It's getting dark, better hurry.

name: Acrostics on Stream
description:
Acrostics on Stream is an interactive game for streamers that can be played with their Twitch chat!

Players try to beat the chat high score by guessing the vertical word and solving horizontal words in progressively harder style.

name: SpongeBob SquarePants: Battle For Bikini Bottom
description: PC version of Spongebob Squarepants: Battle For Bikini Bottom. Unlike its console counterpart, it is a collection of mini-games.

name: Fire Emblem: Legends of Avenir
description: "Fire Emblem: Legends of Avenir is an incredibly distinct ROM hack that uses elements not utilized by the core series until later entries in the franchise such as Fire Emblem: Awakening. Most notably, prior to beginning the first chapter, a player is able to create their protagonist, choosing not just their gender and class, but also their background, altering the course of the game's story! Additionally, as this hack is filled with decisions for the player to make, the game features several route splits that greatly impact the trajectory of a player's experience, truly making your choices matter." - Paul DiSalvo

name: BlazBlue: Entropy Effect
description: Embrace the enthralling explorations and challenges with your characters, each uniquely customized through roguelite gameplay. Discover the truth of the world during the adventure, and alter the course of human destiny through your choices.

name: Idleplex
description: You’re going to build the world’s largest idle game mosaic… with goats. Earn money by playing minigames or leave them be as they play themselves. The more money you get, the more minigame boards you can purchase. Watch as your mosaic expands and more farm animals join the party.

name: Sonic Hopping
description: Sonic Hopping is a mobile phone game released in 2004 on the Sonic Cafe service offered by Sega.

name: Sonic Hopping 2
description: Sonic Hopping 2 is a mobile phone game released as part of the Sonic Cafe service offered by Sega and is the sequel to the original Sonic Hopping.

name: Sonic Hearts
description: Sonic Hearts is a mobile phone game that was available in Japan through the Sonic Cafe service offered by Sega.

name: Sonic Panel Puzzle
description: Sonic Panel Puzzle is a mobile phone game released as part of the Sonic Cafe service offered by Sega.

description: Amy's American Page One is a mobile phone game that was available through the Sonic Cafe service offered by Sega. Based on the Japanese card game, "American Page One," it features Amy competing against Rouge, Cream and a Hero Chao.

name: Sonic Kart 3DX
description: Sonic Kart 3DX is a mobile phone game released on the Sonic Cafe service offered by Sega. It is a 3D sequel to Sonic Racing Kart.

name: Shadow Shoot
description: Shadow Shoot is a mobile phone game released as part of the Sonic Cafe service offered by Sega.

name: Sonic Golf 3D
description: Sonic Golf 3D is a mobile phone game released as part of the Sonic Cafe service offered by Sega. It is the sequel to the 2002 Sonic Golf.

name: Sonic Speed DX
description: Sonic Speed DX is a mobile phone game released as part of the Sonic Cafe service offered by Sega.

name: Fortress 1024
description: FORTRESS 1024 is a gothic like map set inside a fortress. The playing area is mostly built within a 1024x1024 scale and the majority of the level is set outdoors. I've tried my hardest to make the gameplay good and challenging. Plenty of teleporting surprises so watch your back. The exit is located in the middle of the map around a nukage moat, you must raise a bridge to get out of this level.

name: Palace of Nemrac
description: A Huge Level for Doom2, created back in 1998. Was my first map for Boom and now has been finally released. Was originally intended for the Doom Millennium project which was never released. The level originally didn't have as much detail, but I have given it a big facelift. In this map, you encounter every type of monster present in Doom2 and all weapons are present except for the BFG?, but who knows, it could be there?. The level is large and detailed and contains several unique sections such as a church and a Nazi building with Swastikas on the floors. Obviously the Demons are using the Nazi's for an experiment with silent teleporters. There are a few Arch Viles hanging around so be cautious. The 10 hard to find secrets come handy, many of them unmarked.

name: Doomed Space Wars
description: Doomed Space Wars is a Star Wars-inspired mapset but with mostly Doom enemies and weapons. There are 9 levels divided into 3x 3 level mini episodes and 3 secret levels. At the end of each 3 level mini episode there is a boss. Every map is huge and takes advantages of Zdoom's special features such as 3D floors and reverb. Also there are tons of secrets and a few top secret Easter eggs. The aim for the level design was realism and a dark atmosphere, with huge height variations and a semi linear overlapping progression.

name: Sulfur
description: It looks that the latest volcano eruption was so strong that some hellspawn were ejected in addition to lava... Approximate playtime around 20 minutes. Classic map (no jumping etc.).

name: Sonic no 7 Narabe
description: Sonic no 7 Narabe is a mobile phone game released as part of the Sonic Cafe service offered by Sega.

name: Death Tormention: The Complete Trilogy
description: 20 years after the release of the original Death Tormention. I present "The Death Tormention Trilogy". This compilation megawad contains all previously released 3 Death Tormention episodes in one megawad replacing Episode 2, Episode 3 and Episode 4 of the Ultimate Doom with improvements to gameplay and various bug fixes over the original. Also replacing Episode 1 is Simply Phobos.

name: World War Alpha
description: Despite their conceptual differences, World War Alpha actually ties into both Sure Shot 3D and Wrecked to complete a trilogy of games. The treacherous ending of Sure Shot (whereby Major Merc Paramount abandons his partner on the island) sent our 2 heroes down separate paths. While Wrecked concerned itself with the island that was left behind, World War Alpha proceeds to tell the story of what happened to the army that flew away. The details are fleshed out in the game via a series of episodic cut-scenes, but the basic gist is that their maniacal appetite for world domination takes them deep into the past - where they expect to brutalize their primitive ancestors with their superior knowledge and technology! Fortunately for us, they get much more than they bargained for from our resourceful forefathers...

name: Sonic's Napoleon
description: Sonic's Napoleon is a mobile phone game released as part of the Sonic Cafe service offered by Sega.

name: Sonic no Jigen Ressha
description: Sonic no Jigen Ressha is a mobile phone game released as part of the Sonic Cafe service offered by Sega.

name: Sonic's Casino Poker
description: Sonic's Casino Poker was the last mobile phone game released as part of the Sonic Cafe service offered by Sega.

name: Sonic Dash Quiz
description: Sonic Dash Quiz is a mobile quiz game released as a part of the Puyo Puyo! Sega service offered by Sega. It is a fast-paced quiz game where Sonic competes against Tails, Knuckles and Shadow in answering multiple choice questions.

name: Sonic Bowling
description: Sonic Bowling is a mobile phone game that was available as a part of the Puyo Puyo! Sega service offered by Sega. It is a remake of the 2002 game of the same name released through Sonic Cafe.

name: Sonic Golf DX
description: Sonic Golf DX is a mobile phone game released as part of the Puyo Puyo! Sega service offered by Sega. It is the sequel to Sonic Golf 3D, which it serves as a graphically enhanced remake of.

name: Sonic Tennis DX
description: Sonic Tennis DX is a mobile phone game released as a part of the Puyo Puyo! Sega service offered by Sega. It is an updated version of the Sonic Cafe game, Sonic Tennis.

name: Gangsta Bean 2
description: Gangsta Bean returns, destroying junk food and nastiness where he finds it! More awesome adventures, skills, enemies and powerups. Booyah!

name: Legend 64
description: Legend 64 is an adventure game, with N64-inspired visuals, where you fight ghosts and undead monsters. Your most precious possession is stolen after you become hopelessly lost inside a mysterious forest, and with nothing but your courage and determination, you embark on a quest to retrieve it. You won't be facing the spirit world alone, however, as you've got a ghost friend to help you across your journey. Together with your companion, the wayward soul named Ember, the two of you must traverse the haunted depths of the demonic castle to recover what you've both lost. Will you survive, or become another permanent resident?

name: Pony Metal U-Gaim
description: A cancelled MSX2 game based on the Fan-made series Pony Metal.

name: Shinseiden Megaseed: Fukkatsu-hen
description: Shinseiden Megaseed: Fukkatsu-hen is a Strategy game, developed by Japan Media Programming and published by Banpresto, which was released in Japan in 1997.

name: Vila do Nevoeiro R.E.L.I.D.O
description: Vila do Nevoeiro R.E.L.I.D.O is an psychological horror game that tells the story of Adam, who has recently moved to the strange Nevoeiro Village shortly after divorcing his wife, and his son, Charles, who has mysteriously disappeared in the midst of a distorted world. Desperately, Adam searches for Charles, not knowing if he is dreaming or going insane.

name: Candy Land Adventure
description: Candy Land Adventure is an adventure game developed by Realtime Associates and published by Hasbro Interactive in 1996.

Japanese release is handled by Falcom themselves, while Clouded Leopard handles the Chinese release and NIS America handles rest of the world.

name: Hex-a-Hop
description: Hex-a-Hop is a hexagonal tile-based puzzle game with one simple goal: destroy all green tiles! There are infinite undos and no time limits -- you just have to find a way to destroy all the green tiles and step on a safe tile at the end.

name: Sombras
description: Sombras is a horror role-playing game that tells the story of a teenager who ends up getting involved with demon worshippers.

name: My Favorite Monster
description: My Favorite Monster was developed by Cute Company, a division of Schoolscape, and released in the United States by Simon & Schuster Interactive.

name: Mooky Takes Manhattan!
description: Sin descripción

description: A game for Game Jam Sydney 2010 where the object is to scream to advance.

description: 30+ levels packed with cheese, what more could a mouse want?

description: A bunch of tgirls get a trip on the world famous transcontinental express

description: This DLC adds Luke as a fighter.

description: Mayhem Survivors is an action rogue-like game, where you feed cute animals with various different foods in order to Survive. It is inspired by Survivors-like games and features 3 different game modes.

name: 1001 Jigsaw World Tour China
description: Tea ceremonies, ancient temples and red dragons! Put your puzzles together and embark on a colourful and unforgettable journey through the multifaceted China.

name: Carrot the Cat
description: Jump into whimsical fun with Carrot The Cat! This cartoony platformer offers vibrant stylized graphics, challenging levels, and endless charm. Purrfect for all ages!

name: Qix: Xonix Casual Edition
description: Remake of a classic old-school hit from 80s, one of the first arcade games ever!

name: EggSort
description: Easter is approaching, and all eggs needs to be sorted.. However someone has planted bombs and clocks so it won't be easy! Are you up for the challenge?

name: Escape Room: Mystery Tales
description: Are you ready to join this mystery adventure journey? Try our new 100-room escape games about kingdom treasure in quest away! The journey is going to be thrilling as there are lots of hidden tasks. Treasure hunt and enjoy adventures in pirates' island games.

name: Simply Gomoku Online
description:
Getting bored playing with computer AI? Can't find a friend to play on the iPad? These are not problems anymore. With Game Center, you can now play online with millions of old or new friends.

The rule is simple, be the first to get an unbroken row of five pieces horizontally, vertically or diagonally to win the game. But like any strategy game with simple rules, good offense-defense balance is the key to win.

name: 10 Pin Shuffle Bowling
description: 10 Pin Poker is a combination of 10 Pin Bowling, Shuffleboard and Five Card Draw Poker.

name: Knighty Knight
description:
Start playing Knighty Knight - A cute and heartfelt epic-adventure puzzle game!
Once upon a time, A Valiant Knight dreamed of going on an adventure to rescue his Beloved Princess from the Evil King!
Escape Enemy Pieces and Traps, use Items and Strategies to solve more than 30 levels of unique Chess Board Puzzles! Enjoy Side Quests for more rewards! Unlock super cute outfits for your Valiant Knight!

name: Decanumber
description: “Decanumber” is engaging mathematics puzzle game!

name: Pocket Jump Game
description: Jump, jump, jump!

name: Castle Secrets: Hidden Object
description:
The ancient order of the Hildegards has been fighting the forces of Evil since the beginning of time. Is their rule almost over? The prophecy that predicts the End of Days is coming true…
The Head of the Order, Aaron Hildegard, has been betrayed and kidnapped by his own brother! The kingdom has been overrun by beasts. But the Prophecy states that one day the chosen hero will come to the rescue of the once great Order, wielding an ancient weapon of great power to turn the tides of war!

name: Plicplic
description:
Let's fly!
Help get PlicPlic, the little umbrella, high enough to discover space and try for a new highscore!
Rush to the stars, slalom through the storms, and avoid the birds!
Priority to fun. With a simple and original game mechanic, discover a new way of playing: you won't get enough of surfing the wind!

name: AirHead Adam
description:
AirHead needs your help!
Right after the Almighty one created the first 2 humans, Adam was abducted by curious aliens! Although Adam broke out of the alien's spaceship, he was left stranded in space. AirHead Adam will need all the help he can get, to find his way home and reunite with his one true love! Play as the Almighty One, and join Airhead Adam in an action adventure rippling across galaxies!

name: Smurf Life
description:
Become the Hero & Embark on an Adventure to Save Smurf Village.
Gargamel has cast a stormy spell that threatens to veil the Smurfs’ village in darkness forever. One special Smurf will rise and become the savior of Smurfs' Village. Papa Smurf has chosen you to combat Gargamel’s gloomy plot!

Create a name and explore as you master new skills, gather resources, craft items and construct tools to counter the spell and push back the impending storm clouds.

Customize your clothing and accessories as you navigate the pathways of the Smurfs’ Village, overcoming obstacles and rescuing your trapped blue friends.
As the chosen Smurf, you’ll embark on an adventure. Complete quests, learn trades like Alchemy and Construction, and level up your skills to bring sunshine and happiness back to the Smurf’s Village!

name: Cruel Jewels
description: Action-packed match-three gameplay! Line up 3 or more jewels to knock them off the board and score; make longer matches to power up jewels with lots of special abilities. Cages, countdowns and the diabolical Leonard himself will keep you on your toes.

name: The Rabbit Crazy Adventure
description: The Rabbit Crazy Adventure is an exciting precision platformer with 50 levels full of challenges and enemies. Take control of a brave rabbit as he embarks on an epic adventure through vibrant and dangerous worlds. Traversing chasms, avoiding deadly traps, and defeating cunning enemies are just a few of the skills you'll need to master to progress.

name: Nevryon

Their tranquil life is thrown into turmoil when a dark power invades, kidnapping the mother to use the family's powers for their own ends. The father and cub set out on a journey to find and rescue her, restoring harmony to the forest while facing a brave and determined adventure against the forces of darkness and mystery.

description:
The ContiTireRace is entering the second round! Are you ready for ContiTireRace2?
Experience the thrill of racing like never before with Continental ContiSportContact 5.
Immerse yourself in the world of tires and enjoy ultimate driving pleasure with ContiSportContact 5 on two new and highly diverse summer tracks on your iPhone.
What are you waiting for? Get racing now!

name: RC Airplane: Flight Simulator
description:
Fly over the skies of the city with a fighter airplane, in full 3D, fulfilling mission objectives.

The less time, more score.

Compare your score with pilots around the world through Game Center.
Your airplane is equipped with machine guns, missiles that veer toward the enemy, and the incredible ray weapon.

Destroy aircraft, enemy helicopters, antiaircraft, ground targets, vehicles in movement.

name: Tap Tap Trillionaire: Invest!
description: Ever dreamed of being your own boss and becoming filthy rich? Now you can live the luxury 8-bit life you’ve always wanted! Crush your competition, become a Door Street tycoon and tap your way to mega riches on Tap Tap Trillionaire – the fast paced business simulator!

Trot out your best horse jumping skills in this super gallop-y arcade classic.
