description: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Mutant Mayhem - Pizza Power is a promotional mobile browser game by Pizza Hut only available in America.

name: Pizza Hut Arcade: Pac-Man
description: Pizza Hut Arcade: Pac-Man is a mobile browser game by Pizza Hut made for their Pac-Man pizza promotion. The game is a port of the original Pac-Man but using AR camera functionality.

name: LEGO Minecraft
description: LEGO Minecraft was a mobile browser AR game made to promote the LEGO sets of the same name.

name: The Barbie Diaries: High School Mystery
description: The Barbie Diaries: High School Mystery is a game based on the 2006 movie The Barbie Diaries. The game is set in Barbie's high school where valuable items for the high school charity auction have gone missing. By locating these Barbie cannot only help the school, but it will also help her land the TV anchor position currently held by Raquelle, a girl she does not like.

name: When Twilight Strikes
description:
You are a bounty hunter.

Responsible for taking in rogue supernaturals, you work for IAOS—the international agency of supernaturals—where, alongside your best friend and partner, you two have quickly become the best hunting duo of the branch.

After a particularly tricky hunt, you brief your boss, Caine Atheron, and come back to work the next day to find that he has mysteriously disappeared overnight, the company is now in the hands of his best friend, Sebastian Mai.

And though no one else seems to question it, something tells you that there's more to the story.

With bounty cases rising at an alarming rate and a second mystery unfolding, you and your ragtag team of allies set out to find the truth.

But as you go further and further, the secrets you uncover begin to make you question: who... or what exactly are you fighting for?

name: Dyin to Live
description: A contagious puzzle game where death is the only way to live! Use infectious abilities to expand your virus hive mind. But spread carefully, because each ability results in your host's death! Master your deadly skills so you can live another day.

name: Fisher's Wharf
description: ️ Welcome to Fisher's Wharf! ️  Dive into the pixelated world of fishing fun!  Cast your virtual fishing rod and get ready for an epic adventure at the colorful Fisher's Wharf!

name: End Up Alone
description: In a dark world, in an empty place full of hidden secrets and parasites, you have to try to escape.

name: Hynpytol
description: Hynpytol is a microscopic puzzle adventure with highly-contagious fun. Where Malady held illimitable dominion over all, there was found only one who put forth HAND to seize Malady.

name: Be the Richest
description: is a tycoon management game that inherits the classic gameplay of Richest #1. It introduces an exciting new stealing mechanism where you can get rich quick by stealing funds from tycoons to strengthen your own power.

name: Barbie Fashion Show: Eye for Style
description: Design fashion shows to help Barbie get ready for Fashion Week in Paris

name: According to Cain
description:
Two brothers. One murder. And a mystery as old as mankind.

You are a medieval investigator sent back in time to learn the secrets behind mankind's first murder. Using a novel alchemy system, observation, and your wits, you must discover the untold truth about Cain and Abel.

name: Extreme Bus Driver 2024
description: Are you ready to become an experienced bus driver? Experience the thrill of transporting passengers in a realistic city with Extreme Bus Driver 2024! Get passengers to their destination on time and safely, earn rewards and customize your bus.

name: 12 Labours of Hercules XV: Little Big Adventure
description: Help Hercules free from the tiny folk's shackles and save Lilliputians' lands from a shadow-casting island floating in the sky!

name: Shoot Rock
description:
When you shoot rock, gem fall out. Get gem. More gem got without shoot = more combo point. Get 10000 point to become master of shoot rock.

This was an entry for PICO-1K Jam 2022. The whole game fits in exactly 1024 bytes of compressed PICO-8 code.

name: Flower Sort Puzzle
description: Flower Sorting Puzzle is a simple logical colorful game similar to water sort puzzle games. No time limit, just daily challenges to solve. Enjoy many levels and quizzes to solve.

name: Ardaria
description: Procedural building, crafting, RPG skills, resource mining, and dynamic NPCs. Master parkour moves, face hordes of enemies, and tame powerful mounts! Embark on an epic adventure in Ardaria!

name: Pre Master
description: Sin descripción

name: Woodturning
description:
The best woodturning simulator.
Complete customer orders.
Turn a piece of wood into the given shape.
Cut (carve), polish, paint and add a stencil to your work.
Earn money and improve your room.

name: Fuzzys Quest 2
description: Its been 3 months since Fuzzy last defeated King Koodie and all seems quiet. Unbeknown to Fuzzy his dreams of a quiet life was all about to change. King Koodie is still out there, What could he be planning?

name: Archipelago Empire
description: Sin descripción

name: Water Power
description: Sin descripción

name: Barbie Magical Fashion
description: Barbie Magical Fashion lets players design their very own Barbie, mixing and matches different outfits, hairstyles, tiaras, makeup patterns, accessories, wings, mermaid tails, and more. Players can transform avatars into princesses, mermaids, fairies, or even create a unicorn. Each step is simple and uses touch mechanics to let players choose and customize. There is a special gift box minigame for each character, where if the player discovers and opens the magical gift box in the correct customization step, they will unlock its reward for all characters.

name: NHL 24
description: NHL 24’s all-new gameplay features bring authentic on-ice action to life. Experience the rush and fatigue of a high-pressure game with the Exhaust Engine, where sustained pressure in the attack zone leads to new game-changing effects like goalie fatigue that slows the netminder’s reaction time the more they get worn down with offensive action; change the momentum with Physics-Based Contact as you break the glass and send players into the bench with big body checks; and get unparalleled player command with the new Vision Passing System and Total Control Skill Moves. Chel is more connected than ever with cross-play in all online team play modes, along with HUT Moments, which lets you recreate classic moments in hockey history and today’s biggest plays. Adding an extra layer of authenticity, Flex Moments introduces 75+ new goal celebrations, and a wholly refreshed presentation complements an enriched crowd atmosphere that makes playing the game feel like you’re at the game.

name: Zombie Survivor
description: Sin descripción

name: Island King
description: Sin descripción

name: Monster Demolition
description: Sin descripción

name: As Talk As Walk Wayfarer Team: One Percent Sleepy
description: It's a boring hypnotic game in the Land of Music. All you have to do is count sheep, count sheep, count sheep,,, flock.

name: Conrad's Quest
description: A 3D top down strategy game. Do u have what it takes to complete all these level and help Conrad. Only the best gamers will be able to complete the last level.

name: Vexed Heroes
description: Welcome to Vexed Heroes! Fun fast paced survival bullet hell, unlock classes and create your own powerful builds and rage through endless new game plus!

name: Revenge of Ilcoin
description: In a futuristic sci-fi action setting you will become “The Miner” and your mission will be to take your powerful weapons and protect your Ilcoins (The ultimate treasure in ILCs) from the space aliens pirates and the evil DBoss leader.

name: Stealth Master: Assassin Ninja
description: Prove your ninja credentials by infiltrating buildings, sliding through the shadows, and taking out bad guys at close quarters, doing your job from a distance with a sniper rifle, or pulling off incredible daredevil heists without being seen in this fun action game that boasts loads of cool mechanics, scores of your favorite characters, and a deadly sense of humor.

name: Puzzle Wars: Heroes
description: Sin descripción

name: Sniper Strike: Special Ops
description: Intercept, eliminate and extract. It’s time to engage the enemy.Sniper Strike is a high-octane sniper experience that pits you in battle across three gameplay modes and 100's of missions. Scout through immersive environments, engage in rapid-fire combat and build the ultimate super-soldier.

name: League of War: Mercenaries
description: Sin descripción

name: Space Colonizers: The Sandbox
description: Sin descripción

name: Stargazing
description: Sin descripción

name: Return to Riddle School
description: A fan-made remake of the cult-classic Riddle School, originally released in 2006 by Jonbro (now goes by Jonochrome). Released on the same date as the final entry in the series.

name: Object-37
description: The game takes place in the near future in Freak Squad's office. During the game, the player will to walk around the office, as well as meet one interesting streamer, who has changed a lot (or not so much) with time. The game is made in the escape-horror genre, where the player has to get out of a closed location, trying not to get caught by its unfriendly inhabitant. Of the tools, the player will only have a weak flashlight and his own microphone, with which he can open doors. However, it is worth remembering that the microphone can both help and harm, forcing you to pay too much attention to you.

name: Big Boo's Revenge
description: A romhack with 91 exits

name: Kinder
description:
In a certain town in a certain place, there lived a boy named Shunsuke Takano. One day, Shunsuke set out alone to visit his grandparents' house, and on a Saturday morning, he promptly departed. It seems that his neighbor, Mami is coming along with him to the bus stop.
However, there was still some time before the bus arrived, so Shunsuke-kun decided to go to the secret meeting place where he usually gathers with his friends.
After playing there for a while, Shunsuke-kun finally boarded the bus.
The next day, when Shunsuke returned he finds not his familiar hometown, but a ruined town of death...

Players control the elementary school protagonist, Shunsuke Takano, navigating the transformed 'town' where they live. The game involves defeating three monsters and uncovering hidden mysteries. Aside from the three monsters, be aware of various traps and puzzles. Additionally, choices and actions in the game may lead to the death of other companions. Be cautious and think carefully about your actions to understand the consequences. Even if companions die, the story will continue, but the ending may change slightly.

While the initial goal is to defeat the three monsters, the objective may shift along the way. You'll eventually discover the truth behind the story. Admittedly, the content may be divisive, especially considering the horror genre with elementary school protagonists.

Encounters are generally non-existent (only occurring during specific events). The game primarily features event-based battles, and as such, the concept of leveling up is not present.

name: Sternly Worded Adventures
description: Sternly Worded Adventures is a roguelite word puzzle RPG inspired by Bookworm Adventures where you travel through a forested peninsula with Yorkshire-sounding place names fighting monsters with the power of words to uncover whatever dark secrets may be lurking beyond.

name: Mega Man: Day in the Limelight
description: Mega Man: Day in the Limelight is the first game in a fangame trilogy based on the 8-bit series of games, and created by Riverroad.

name: Sold Soul
description:
Sold Soul is a full-on Heretic episode with 9 levels and challenging gameplay.
The story is that you play as a merchant with some unnatural powers and skills who have been betrayed and seeking revenge.

name: Unbeliever
description: UnBeliever is a three-episode, vanilla Heretic megaWAD where each episode offers a different gameplay experience and are designed to be played in any order. E1 has lots of gimmicky combat scenarios, mostly focused on Heretic's unique gadgets. E2's maps are ultra short and action- packed, built with only 100 linedefs a piece. And E3's trials require quick thinking and quicker reflexes.

name: Relyctum
description: A new episode that replaces the first standard Doom II. The levels gradually introduce the player into a dangerous world of death by showing ways of survival and success in it.

name: Gorehounds of Doom
description: Gorehounds of Doom is an 18 level megawad for doom 2 in mbf21 format started by Thelokk. The theme of the project was simple and unrestrictive, with each mapper creating something under their personal interpretation of horror in a doom wad. The result is a wide variety of maps ranging from atmospheric environmental storytelling to slaughter under a dark/gory aesthetic.

name: [Untitled]
description: Eight challenging maps build entirely with vanilla resources

name: Drought
description: 3 short, Boom compatible maps built with @Noiser's excellent D4V mod and using @ukiro's wonderful OTEX texture pack. Each map is originally a ~1 hour speedmap that has received tweaks and refinement over the last month since their initial version.

name: The Mauve Zone
description: Sin descripción

name: Brood of Hatred
description: For reasons unknown you wake up in a strange place. Another world. A world populated by evil. The brood of hatred! And once again you really have no other choice...no other choice than grabbing a nearby shotgun and start blasting your way...home?

name: Hell Unearthed
description: Sin descripción

name: Angel Sweet
description:
This is the first game made by Parun.
Three angels embark on an adventure to find ingredients for sweets. Multiple stages are prepared, each with a different story.

name: Before You Forget
description: Sin descripción

name: Horde Havoc
description: As a valiant warrior, your mission is to combat a relentless 2d battle against hordes of monstrous creatures. Can you withstand the Havoc and emerge victorious against the horde?

name: Gunsmoke
description: Gunsmoke is a shooter game. The goal of the player is to eliminate all the gunmen that appear in the screen.

name: Assembly Line
description: Assembly Line is a facility map created in UDMF format with a warm color scheme and clean visual style. The map makes use of arena based encounters, modern scripting capabilities and a dynamic, purpose written soundtrack scoring your playthrough.

name: Demonic Destruction!
description: Sin descripción

name: Hell's Farthest Shore
description: Hell's Farthest Shore will be a replacement episode for The Shores of Hell, with a focus on huge, imposing architecture and atmospheric exploration, punctuated with frantic combat.

name: Honey and Swallowtail
description: Sin descripción

name: The Hate Flow
description: Sin descripción

name: Cold Front
description: Cold Front is a 4 map wad for limit removing ports featuring snowy landscapes and Egyptian architecture.

name: Micro Olympics on Mars
description:
Will you be the champion of Micro-Olympics on Mars?
Shoot your flying saucer as far as you can.
Buy and carefully use power-ups on your way to the top.
Try to beat all 7 glorious pilots in this fast paced game…

name: Infraworld: The Hatehammer
description:
The basic ideas of this map are infernalism in design and the general non-linearity in gameplay. I have never tried to widely disclose them in my maps and wanted to practice. In some places everything turned out as I had planned, in some places very average. Nevertheless, I am pleased with the final result. As an experiment, I added coop-starts, but cooperative was not tested at all. The difficulty is above medium, but you can choose from HMP and UV.

The map is very long (about one and a half hours), so it will be tiring to go through in single try. The player is faced with the task of finding 6 yellow keys scattered across map locations. The keys must be placed on pedestals in a separate huge room, which can be reached via a teleport in the center of the map (where the hammer is). I think this should help you not to despair if you get lost.

name: If...
description: Sin descripción

name: 25 Years on Earth
description: To celebrate the 25th Anniversary of the introduction of such wonders as the Super Shotgun and Arch Vile, I present a brand new, limit-removing megaWAD, which uses every line and sector action at least once! Difficulty starts low and gradually builds through this set as your journey unfolds across a planet lost to Hell 25 years ago. Will this be the mission that finally defeats the demons? No jumping or crouching, please! Do feel free to use mouse look (I do), and if gameplay mods are your thing, go ahead - this should be compatible with everything. The megaWAD is designed for continuous play, but every map is beatable from pistol starts if that's how you prefer to do things!

name: Sucker Punch 2
description: Sucker Punch 2 contains nine small, single-player maps for Doom II. The maps require a limit-removing port. The WAD is made up from three mini-episodes of three maps each which escalate from easy (with green details) to harder (yellow) to hardest (red). These are slightly larger than the maps in the original Sucker Punch (2018), and should mostly take 3-5 minutes each to play. Difficulty settings are implemented. The maps are designed for pistol starts.

name: Team Fortress 2: Death & Taxes
description:
The Death & Taxes update, was the first major update for Team Fortress 2 Classic.

The update focused on cut content from Team Fortress 2. Its flagship feature is the VIP game mode, in which BLU team must escort the new Civilian class to the end of the map, while RED team has to assassinate him. To highlight this new game mode, three VIP maps were included: Trainyard with a single capture point and a one-life VIP, Mineside with a VIP-exclusive briefcase that must be delivered to unlock the capture point, Harbor with three capture points and no special gimmicks, and a VIP version of Badwater Basin with four capture points (later reduced to three) and a nighttime atmosphere.

Another major feature was the addition of Four-Team mode, shattering the previous paradigm of RED and BLU by introducing GRN and YLW. The new Four-Team maps were the Arena map Flask, and a Domination version of Hydro - which itself is a new game mode, with Oil Canyon as a two-team exemplar. The update also brought back 9 new weapons based on unreleased Team Fortress 2 content, as well as 6 weapons and 31 maps that already exist in TF2.

In addition, most mechanics were rebalanced based on Team Fortress 2 updates, and the vast majority of the game was refactored in design, interface, and content. The prior "deathmatch" game mode was removed entirely, as well as numerous weapon concepts and aesthetic choices. Finally, the update also included improved bot support for offline play, a new achievement system, nametag medals for developers, contributors, and beta testers, and many, many exclusive settings, console commands, and weapon attributes.

name: Tetraptykon
description: Tetraptykon is a set of four maps for strong limit-removing ports (PrBoom-Plus would be the minimum requirement, and -complevel 2 would be the preferrable option) that aim to merge oldschool-flavored slaughter gameplay with modern visual appearance. For the sake of the latter, @ukiro's OTEX resource set was also applied.

name: Literalism
description: Literalism is a 26-level Boom mapset that came to life as a community project hosted by Yours Truly. Running between July 22nd and August 22nd, 2021, the project employed a gimmick somewhat inspired by how speedmapping sessions often place a thematic restriction. Participating mappers were given a randomly generated map title to make maps inspired by. Maps were compiled into this mapset in order of submission, so the difficulty curve may be all over the place.

name: Dungeon Synths
description: Dungeon Synths is a 9+1 map musical odyssey from the Digital Bards Krew, merging the worlds of medieval fantasy and vintage synthesizers. This is the first of (hopefully) many bimonthly ZDoom-oriented community projects organized by several veterans of the DBP series, run on the ZDoom forums. The project targets ZDoom 2.8.1 but has also been tested with recent GZDoom versions. Dungeon Synths features an ogg soundtrack of music from classic RPGs, particularly Legend of Dragoon and Dark Cloud 2, newly arranged for (virtual) vintage synthesizers and drum machines.

name: The DBK Holiday Special
description: The DBK Holiday Special is a 15-map Christmas adventure from the December Bastards Krew, which takes the holiday season into the darkest reaches of outer space. Fans of Alien Bastards! and Spaceballs: The Seque﻿l should be particularly interested in this one! ;)

name: Shrine of the Silver CyberPrimate
description: Shrine of the Silver CyberPrimate is a 6+? map techno-mesoamerican adventure from the Diabolical Broadcasting Korporation, serving as a semi-spiritual successor to DBP09: Legends of the Hidden Tech. The project targets ZDoom 2.8.1 but has also been tested with recent GZDoom versions, especially 4.10.0. As with previous DBKs, the goal here is to use well-established ZDoom features to suggest a hypothetical '90s game engine made up of bits of Doom, Build, Quake, and Hexen. Since our goal is not to push the bleeding edge of modern source ports, effort has been made to keep the set playable on lower-spec machines.

name: Team Fortress 2 Classic: Fight or Flight
description:
The Fight or Flight update, was the second major update for Team Fortress 2 Classic.

True to its namesake, it focused on content related to mobility, as well as several weapons and maps. Its flagship feature is the Jump Pad, an Engineer building that allows taking to the skies. The Anti-Aircraft Cannon was designed for Heavy to swat enemies out of the air, while the Twin Barrel affords Pyro greater mobility. The Brick gives Scout a hard-hitting projectile, while the Heavy gains Chekhov's Punch and the Pyro gains the Harvester - both weapons that store critical hits for later. Finally, L'escampette gives the Spy an alternate watch, allowing for easier escapes.

The update also introduces the Arena map Floodgate, the Four-Team King of the Hill map Frigid, the Payload map Jinn, the Four-Team Medieval Mode map Krepost, and the new Territorial Domination game mode with the map Caper.

name: Santa Launch
description:
Will you be the champion of Micro Olympics Christmas?
Shoot your sledge as far as you can.
Buy and carefully use power-ups on your way to the top.
Try to beat all 7 glorious pilots in this fast paced game…

name: Sweet Halloween
description: Sin descripción

name: Yuuichi to Suihanki
description: Sin descripción

name: Gote to Handa
description: Sin descripción

name: Aeternum
description: 3 action packed levels of varying size. Few puzzles. Built after playing (and loving every second of) Alien Vendetta. Difficulty is intentionally set somewhat high.

name: Invasion...: Level 1 - Contamination
description:
This is level 1 of a 9 level storyline episode.

You thought it was all over after you finished the grand tour in hell after Episode 3 -- Inferno.

Well, Mars Base has sent in an urgent distress call and this time you are called again for one final encounter against the... INVASION!

name: Invasion...: Level 2 -The Upper Decks
description:
This is level 1 of a 4 level storyline episode.

[It's too much work to make 9, so we decided to compress the story a bit!]

name: Osiris
description:
OSIRIS Total Conversion is the much-expanded sequel to I, ANUBIS (a DOOMGATE "Best Doom2 of all time" level). OSIRIS makes that one look like pac-man.

OSIRIS contains incredible new monsters, textures, graphics, and sounds (326 new sprites!). Loosely (very loosely) based on the movie "STARGATE". Designed to be DIFFICULT, with serious thought applied to gameplay, lighting, architecture, immersion, and theme.

Gameplay will be best on ULTRAVIOLENT in single-player or co-op modes. Provision for deathmatch is not included. OSIRIS is NOT so huge as to slow your machine to a crawl, but faster machines will, of course, play better.

name: Skepland
description: An attempt to create difficult, non-linear maps in the plutonia visual style, without going the slaughterfest route.

name: Zaero
description: Zaero: Episode 1 is a three-level PWAD for Doom II, released in June 2005 by Steven Searle. Built for the ZDoom source port, Zaero is heavily inspired by Quake II and features a similar aesthetic, with the gameplay enhancements being reinforced by the addition of several custom enemies through DECORATE. Planned to be the first entry with more maps to come, no sequel ever materialized.

name: Rylayeh
description: Ten levels based on the Lost City of R'Lyeh.

name: Judgment
description: Judgment is a 34 map MBF21 megawad that makes extensive use of Dehacked features to modify existing monsters and implement new monsters and mechanics.

name: Nensha
description:
Nensha is a mostly run-and-gun style loop through a grimy, demonic techbase, made in boom format (complevel 9). I've never been big on making techbases, but I had fun exploring some ideas with this one. Fingers crossed that it's bug-free and some kind of entertaining!

In terms of difficulty, I tried to aim for that Plutonia/Scythe/Valiant range (with varying degrees of success). It's not a complete pushover, but not overly punishing.

Hurt Me Plenty was what the map was built for (""intended experience""). It has some kick to it here and there, but most players shouldn't feel too out of their element. Ultra-Violence is just HMP with a few extra cheeky monsters/encounters, intended to catch the player off guard a bit more.
HNTR is now Hunted! Taking inspiration from Mutabor's "Onslaught!", this is an alternate version of the map for anyone who prefers their Doom extra spicy. Gets into slaughter territory, and I probably wouldn't recommend it as a first impression.

name: Caffeine Injection!
description:
Caffeine Injection is 5 maps long episode for Doom II done between 2020-2022. It's made from various projects I couldn't finish in time or left when I changed my mind. I didn't want to waste those levels, so I compiled them in one small ep.
Pistol start is the intended experience.

name: Azazel's Second Descent
description: Azazel's Second Descent is a full, 32 map megawad. This is a one-man megawad and all maps were made by me. I would categorize the maps as slaughter-lite, meaning it is not full-on slaughter but you might face a horde or two, especially the farther into the wad you go. The WAD is broken down into six 5-map episodes. There are 4 new monster types and 2 bosses added.

name: The Box of a Thousand Demons
description: The Box of a Thousand Demons is a brand new 32-map Boom megawad, targeting DSDA-Doom as a port and using OTEX as its main texture pack. It focuses on variety over visual consistency, and explicitly caters to all manners of niche and aberrant gameplay - within you will find lite and fat slaughter, key hunts, puzzles, platforming, pacifist maps, Tyson maps, NoMo maps, ammo starvation maps, the whole nine yards. A little something for everyone. Atmosphere was my main concern, with streamlined gameplay a distant second.

name: Twelve Easy Pieces
description: "Twelve Easy Pieces" (formerly known as "Constraining Order") is a set of twelve (or was it thirteen?...) Boom format maps that sets out to do exactly what it says on the tin - provide you some fun in an easy, stress-free environment. No evil archvile closets here (although my memory might fail me, it's been a while since I cleaned out those closets); no nasty obstacles to your carefree circlestrafing (watch your step though, I'm not insured); and certainly no revenants (skinny guy in red pants told me, how could he be wrong?). Take a stroll through techbases, temples, aquatic environments and out-there voids, always knowing that even on UV you'll never face anything worse than a slightly spicy HMP Plutonia. Small maps with low monster counts, a restrained texture choice, and occasionally a dash of my personal foibles - puzzles and platforming. Nothing you can't overcome, believe me

name: Declared New Apocalypse
description:
The player will travel through prisons, rifts, mazes, fortresses, forests, graveyards, sewers, factories, labs, the Hell, haunted libraries, all to chase down (or be chased down) by new stronger demons and bosses, but with the help of new powerful weapons at his disposal.

The wad presents 3 new Episodes, with 14 new levels, 12 + 2 secret, a Hub (reachable by beating the final level or just by entering the "Reliquary" episode), from where you can play all of the levels pistol starting (actually "fist starting"), go to a "testing area", change the skill level and reach the secret 15th level, a wave based arena.

name: Super 20 in 1
description:
A bootleg cartridge released in Korea. It included NES games.

1. Spartan X (Kung Fu)
2. Super Mario Bros.
3. Antarctic Adventure
4. Twin Bee
5. Battle City
6. Circus Troupe
7. Galaga
8. Yie Ar Kung-Fu
9. Star Force
10. Road Fighter
11. Pinball
12. Bomberman
13. Tetris
14. Arkanoid
15. BallonFight
16. Donkey Kong
17. Gorilla 3 (Donkey Kong 3)
18. Donkey Kong Jr.
19. Mr. Mary (Mario Bros.)
20. Popeye

name: Mutant Forge
description: Mutant Forge is a free to play real-time-battler. Play through campaign to Forge new mutants, battle in real time with your team against other players, and even create your own levels using our level editor tool.

name: The Man in the Park 2
description: It's been so long. You've tried to forget, however tonight you must walk through the park again. Now there are two men in the park. Will you help one, or both? Who will you trust?

name: Project Americas
description: Project Americas is a game that shows life in a criminal area as it is. You play as an ordinary fighter who has grand ambitions and strives for more. Make your way to the top of the criminal world, make your orders, create your gang, and keep the whole city at bay.

name: Catch Up
description: Welcome to the enchanting world of "Catch Up"! Get ready to embark on an exciting precision platforming adventure like you've never seen before! Join an epic journey with a brave cat where skill and precision will be your best allies.

name: Well, me neither
description: Originally designed for a community project, Well, me Neither is a short Doom 2 adventure through a possibly flesh-infested neighbourhood. It didn't quite fill the project's rubric, but I still feel it scrapes by just enough to deserve a second lease on life.

name: Mekanism
description: 12 maps of orange and purple.

name: Penelope
description: Penelope.wad is a sort of bookend to my first year of mapping, and a distilled extract of everything I like in my mapping soup: complex architecture, out-there texturing, strange progression and a whole lot of atmosphere. There are also a few demons to kill, but nothing worrisome - little more than a nuisance. Only a few are archviles, and even fewer are cyberdemons and spider masterminds. Most combat is optional, and the exit can be reached in only a few minutes, though I'd invite you to stay for the whole experience if you will...

name: Contra Spirits 64
description:
Contra Spirits 64 is a canceled entry in the Contra series that was being in development in 1998 by Konami Computer Entertainment Osaka and was planned to be released on the Nintendo 64.

The game was presumably going to be a side-scrolling platformer shoot 'em up in 2.5D, with the camera probably changing to a higher perspective in certain sections and boss battles.

Most likely due to poor sales of the Nintendo 64 in Japan, Konami ultimately decided to stop the project and disbanded the team, which then were assigned to work separately in different projects.

name: Silence
description: This is my "oddly named but lovable beast of wad" (kalensar) that replaces Doom 1in the style of Doom the Way Id Did. To ensure vanilla compatibility, I've tested the wad in Chocolate Doom and cleaned up any issues I could find. This wad doesn't try to reinvent the wheel, just maybe grease up the axel a little bit. Also with the levels is a pack of midis I wrote and decided to include for use alongside the levels. That's right, the first 36 level ultimate doom megawad of 2022, and the only limit we removed was your imagination.

name: Reconstruction/Decomposition
description: A silver spaceship with custom textures. Loosely based on Termination by mrthejoshmon. The second map in the wad is just a small "outro" level.

name: Dark Tide
description: A sprawling coastal castle swarming with Hellspawn

name: The Old Bean Factory
description: The map is pretty linear and has a bunch of tangents and secrets and is stuffed with low-tier enemies and pickups for all you murder-headed-secret-hunting-bonus-fiends out there.

name: Icebound
description: Clear the heretical forces from the frozen caverns

name: Hellscape
description: A re-imagining those Doom II levels that take place in Hell (21-30). As such, these maps will probably be a lot more entertaining if you have a reasonable working knowledge of the original IWAD levels...

name: Chaos Chain: Supporter Cosmetic Pack
description: The Supporter Cosmetic Pack is for people who'd like to show some extra support for Chaos Chain and the developers at Corrosive Studios and to help us continue to grow. As a thank you, you'll receive 8 unique skins to show off your style as you descend into the shadows of Slade City!

name: Death Again
description: Death Again is a single player horror fps. Journey through a nightmarish realm that lies between dimensions in search for salvation.

name: Mujina: Maze Game VR
description: Mujina is a Maze Exploration game where the player has to activate 4 objective points and reach the end portal. Beware of the monsters and the numerous traps awaiting you! If everyone dies, it will result in a failure! Group up with your friends to complete the 3 type of mazes!

name: The Magenta Spire
description: The Magenta Spire is a partial conversion mapset taking place in parallel to the events of Doom 1; albeit on a much more remote planet. Much too far for any hope of "backup" arriving from Earth. A lone UAC communications technician must find a way to survive the onslaught of demonic forces invading the remote research complex. A shuttle off of this rock, a big gun, or maybe a bomb shelter to hide and weather the storm. The walls of every installation are coming down and the monsters seem to have brought their own reality with them.

name: VRiking
description: VRiking is a Runner game in VR! Accelerate as fast as you can while collecting points along the way! Dodge the approaching obstacles!

name: The Isle Survival
description: The Isle Survival is a vast open world survival / crafting game. Loot resources, craft items, build camps and explore the environment. Protect yourself from hazards and wildlife. Find ways to survive in hostile living conditions.

name: Ring Stars
description: Ring Stars is a physics-based 3D fighting game with local multiplayer for up to 4 players.

name: Color Splash: Dogs
description: Color Splash: Dogs is a charming and relaxing puzzle game that will lift your spirits and take You into the world of adorable dogs and art. Venture into the gallery, where you will find many extraordinary and colorful dog paintings.

name: Five Nights at Freddy's: Help Wanted Plus
description: Five Nights at Freddy’s: Help Wanted + is a mod for FNAF Help Wanted, that aims to bring back cut features from the original Help Wanted, and add in completely new levels and characters!

name: Doodlebug
description:
Doodlebug is back! almost 20 years on since this classic platform adventure first appeared commercially on Amiga and Atari ST.
Doodlebug offers twenty levels of varied platform action spread across five themed worlds. Interactive characters within the the game allow Doodlebug to buy submarines, buggies, dragons, helicopters and space ships to help him on his quest to rescue the lovely Princess Lady Bug.

name: Who Is It?
description: How many famous people do you know? You say "Oh, I know a lot of them". Check it! The application is based on the painting "Discussing the Divine Comedy with Dante" by chinese artists Dai Dudu, Li Tiezi, and Zhang An. This extraordinary painting depicting 103 figures from world history in striking detail. If you can guess at least half of them it will be great result!

name: Stick Tennis Tour
description: Jet off to join the Stick Tennis Tour! Create your player and tour the world in the "definitive virtual tennis experience" (The Sun).

name: Steal the Meal: Unblock Puzzle
description: Feed an insatiable red cat in Steal the Meal: Unblock Puzzle. Enjoy a new comic twist on classic snakes mechanics with cute characters and amuzing sounds. Help the spy mice filch strings of sausages, fish, ham and other yummy treats from the fridge. The less moves you make, the more stars you get. Collect stars to unlock new brain-teasing levels for free! Challenge your logic with a cheerful unblock game for all ages!

name: Tapgym
description:
Are you ready, bro? Let’s get tapping!
We live for the gym, but what do we do when we’re not at the gym? We #tapgym!
Smash through push ups, lifts, lunges, sit ups, and so much more…
Do you have the muscle to reach #berserkmode and be the toughest bro alive?

name: Snappy Elf
description:
Help Santa collect gifts!
The Elves are misbehaving and up to mischief! They have a few pranks up their sleeves for Santa!
How many gifts can you collect?
Merry Christmas and enjoy!

name: Snake Quest
description:
Snake Quest is a version of the classic snake game which is extremely popular. The game runs in beautiful full screen in clear definition on the iPad. There are puzzle games, race against time features, endless random levels, and more! The main goal is to get all the jewels in a level, but beware of running into yourself, spikes or fire walls.
The app includes over 45 unique, vastly challenging levels in four worlds that bat an eyelash or two to popular culture while engaging players with diverse challenges. Not satisfied with these levels? Don’t sweat it, Snake Quest includes 190 additional levels in eight worlds that you can access via in-app purchase whenever you want.

name: Shoot n Scroll 3D
description: Helicopter arcade game. Shoot'em-up action with plenty of sky adventures and adrenaline. The game is aimed at all gamblers, from novices to core action gamers. Gamblers can try their skills at lot of levels and bosses. As they complete levels, gamblers gain access to new, more powerful armed enemies and unexpected air attack surprises. Easy game controls, arcade action and lot of guns, bullets, rockets and explosions. Ready for takeoff? Wheels up!

name: Nitro Nation World Tour
description:
Get ready to race across the globe in Nitro Nation World Tour! – an all new car racing and car collection experience made to celebrate car culture. Drive some of the fastest cars in the world in this free to play drag racing game. With officially licensed cars, drag racing will never be the same experience again!
Show off your fleet of exotic cars to your friends, or flaunt your fastest quarter mile with your tuned out ride! Immerse yourself in the complete drag racing experience, with a challenging campaign mode and high-octane PvP gameplay.

name: Mystery Crypt
description: Mystery Crypt is a brand new Halloween game that involves scares and logic. The mind game is arranged in a sort of puzzle that gets your brain working without getting bored. The action takes place on a graveyard, filled with tons of white bones on a dark Halloween night. The bones were left from previous players who did not have enough brains to win the game. Your job, as a player, is to save the unfortunate souls and bring the dead players back to life by connecting their broken bones on the graveyard.

name: BrainTaire
description:
There is no way to find most talented person in the world! One thing that Google can not help you search!
It will be interesting to find most talented person by country/year/city/schools.
Only the most talented person in the world will be able to beat all 6 levels of this game! Is that you?

name: Battle Slugs
description:
Playing Battle Slugs, you take command of a well-trained army of the finest slugs, either green angelic slugs or red devilish slugs (you can decide which, based on what you did last night).
Slug it out across a variety of hexagon-celled playing fields, each with its own sweet spots and bottlenecks, using strategy to claim the most territory and conquer the field. The game includes colorful cartoony graphics, plus changing backgrounds and custom soundtrack music.
Your progress is saved and sent to the Game Center high scores list.
Take on a friend or go up against the cold logic of the CPU on one of three levels of difficulty.

Is your vision 20/20?
If You score below 20 you FAIL.

name: Flown
description:
Flown is a highly original game, Tap and tilt your way to the top in this simple, fun game, with 36 of the craziest characters to collect,
especially number 7!
Help the Early Bird find his friends on a quest that will take you deep under the sea to the farthest reaches of outer space! Flap your wings through 6 different worlds enlisting the help of all the pets and wild creatures you find along the way!

name: Colorim
description:
So simple, yet addictive...
Colorim is the second game in our color series, after Coloround...
Colorim is all about a rim sliced into colors. There is an arrow in the middle with a dot on it's tail. Simply tap the screen to throw that dot to where the arrow points. Do your best to shoot the matching color in the rim but beware of the black dots in between because you should avoid hitting them.
It may sound and look easy at the beginning, but beware all the bits and tricks you'll encounter on each upcoming level...

name: Clinton vs. Trump: Head Soccer Challenge
description:
Hilary Clinton vs Donald Trump, United States presidential election 2016. What if they would meet on a soccer pitch?
Fast paced retro style soccer game where you play as one of the candidates for president of the United States.

name: Color Teaser
description:
Color Teaser is a fast paced mind bending brain teasing game that will tease, confuse and possibly make you rage.
How many of you know that your right-brain tries to say the colour but your left-brain insist to say the word. That is right, with Color Teaser, we like you to experiment yourself and find out how good you are with responding to both side of your brains signal.
In a very short time you will have to choose the answer based on the color of the text and not based on what is written. We warn you that if you choose the incorrect answer at any level then you will have to start all over again from level 1.

name: My Little Garden
description:
Plant, water and fertilize the plants, help them flourish and make them happy.
Use garden tools, summon supernatural rains, warm sunrays or magical smoke.

name: Hidden Object: Travel to Future - Ancient Portals
description:
Hidden Object: Travel to Future - Ancient Portals
Victoria stumbles upon a time portal while visiting her late uncle's house. She excitedly uses it and causes a temporal clash. The future and past start to meld together to create a time paradox. The fate of humanity hangs in the balance and only Victoria can stop it! Travel to victorians France, ancient India and visit the mysterious Mayans to correct the time paradox and save the world in this engaging hidden object puzzle adventure.

name: Galaxy on Fire: Alliances
description: Wormholes open. Conquerors appear. Planets fall. The Shroud Nebula is about to be seized and raided. And only YOU can stop it. Team up with longtime allies and old enemies alike to face the ruthless invaders, steal their rare treasures and build their superior carriers! Save the galaxy from the tyranny of the Voids!

name: Football Maestro
description:
A simple, highly tactical football manager game to rival the best phone games currently on the market. Create your own club and play against real users from across the world, in live, real time matches to see who can achieve the glory!
Play in up to 4 different competitions against real users in seasons which last a week.
As well as a world ranking game mode to see who's the weekly Creme de la Creme of Football Maestro.

name: Kickin Kong
description:
Get your Monkey on!
Help Kong kick through 10 whacky levels, encountering many bizarre characters, hazards & challenges along the way.
In this annoyingly addictive casual 3D game, keepie uppies may seem simple, but when the cute critters & bombs start dropping the pressure can just get too much for some people…

name: Kusok
description: Kusok (Kurashiki's Kuso Map) is a two-level minisode made for Boom-compatible source ports.

name: Moonlight
description: Moonlight is a monsterless puzzle map with an emphasis on cryptology.

name: DreamWorks Trolls Remix Rescue
description: Play as Poppy, Branch and more of your favorite DreamWorks Trolls as you explore, smash, dance and battle your way towards rescuing the Troll Kingdom from a melodic mastermind who’s trying to alter the Trolls’ musical harmony!

name: A Space for the Unbound: Collector's Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Persona 5 Royal: 1 More Edition
description:
1 More Edition includes:

Treasure Chest Box - Collector’s box to hold your palace’s treasure.
Le Grimoire Art Frame - Plastic art frame inspired by Justine’s Le Grimoire clipboard.
Phantom Thieves Art Prints - Set of 5”x7” glossy high-quality prints made to be displayed in the included Frame.
Akechi’s Briefcase Bag - Akechi’s signature briefcase made into a 15” bag with logo on the front.
Arcana Tarot Card Deck - 24-card tarot deck featuring artwork of the arcana in a branded box.
Persona 5 Royal SteelBook Case - SteelBook game case featuring Persona 5 Royal artwork.
Physical Persona 5 Royal Game - Copy of Persona 5 Royal with over 40 items of previously released DLC included.

name: Fort Solis: Limited Edition
description: The limited edition physical version contains a special 3D cover and an exclusive metallic effect postcard.

name: Record of Agarest War: Limited Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Turkey Fling
description: Get ready for a gobbling good time! Watch out for the many hazards along the way like pointy-pointy forks, burning candles, gooey pies, steaming gravy and jelly traps. Oh yeah, watch the re-entry from space or you’ll end up a crispy mess.

name: Sargasso
description: Sargasso is an 11-map space adventure episode for DooM II which requires a Boom-compatible port to play. You play as Wolf - the leader of a mercenary team which resides in a space station hideout known as Sargasso - until one day aliens capture a loaded cargo ship and wreak havoc on any who oppose. It's up to you now - grab your high-tech weaponry and show them who rules this side of the galaxy!

name: Eternally Yours
description: Eternally Yours is an 11-map episode that should work for vanilla Doom. I would say the levels work better playing from pistol start to avoid having too much for the next level, but that's your decision. Anyway, I hope you enjoy playing them as much as I did making them

name: Hai Shuuraku Tansaku
description:
The protagonist embarks on a journey to an abandoned village upon a friend's request...
Investigate what happened in the abandoned village in this first-person horror game.

name: Hai Byouin Tansaku
description:
The protagonist heads to an abandoned hospital at the request of a friend...
A first-person horror game about finding out what happened in an abandoned hospital.

name: Bloody Heck
description: An 8 map WAD with level design inspired by mouldy's Going Down

name: The Other Me
description: The Other Me is a first-person psychological horror game delving into the realms of horror that prowl the recesses of one's psyche. Pursue the dread ruminations amidst the maelstrom of the Asylum. This game offers both mind-bending horror elements and realistic environments.

name: Space Vikings
description: Pillage and plunder across the galaxy as part of a crew of Space Vikings in this sci-fi roguelite bullet hell dungeon crawler. Find exotic weapons, upgrade them with powerful augments, explore mysterious alien planets, and unleash viking vengeance on their inhabitants.

name: Bullets & Brains
description: Bullets and Brains is an adrenaline-pumping arcade top-down 3D shooter set in a post-apocalyptic world overrun by brain-hungry hordes of zombies. Prepare yourself for an intense battle against the never-ending onslaught of the undead.

name: Hyperlight Survivor
description: A Competitive Bullet Hell with roguelite mechanics. Fight against endless hordes of enemies in ever-changing arenas, unlock new spaceships and upgrade them with devastating weapons and Power-Ups. Beat your highscore and reach new ranks to become the ultimate Champion!

name: An Arcade Full of Cats
description: Journey through gaming history's time and space, while searching for adorable feline companions in 'An Arcade Full of Cats,' the ultimate pet'em up hidden object game.

name: Kombate Mexicano Elexiones
description: Kombate Mexicano Elexiones is a fighting game featuring digitized stereotyped character trying to win the presidency of Mexico.

name: Lessaria: Fantasy Kingdom Sim
description: Lessaria is a unique strategy game that combines city building with indirect hero control. Build and manage a thriving kingdom while issuing commands and quests to guide your heroes in their adventures. Explore, conquer, and shape the destiny of your realm in this epic fantasy world.

name: Rhino Runner
description: Runner Game where Rhino needs find balloons in different maps and avoid deathly traps.

name: Wobble Warriors
description: Wobble Warriors is a 1-4 player ragdoll fighting couch co-op game. In this dungeon crawler, you and your friends play as some wobbly dragons on a mission to conquer the goblins who stole your gold. Jump, dash, ground pound, and bonk your way to victory by clearing each room.

name: Black Journey to the West
description: Black Journey to the West "is a vampire like survivor game that integrates Roguelike elements. Choose a character from a scripture gathering team, build character treasures and skills, challenge the blackened All Sky God Buddha, and shatter the darkness that envelops the Divine World.

name: Fittest Fire
description: In a ruined world, overrun by evil robots, a disabled cyborg named Blaze rests. Send a spark of energy from your world to Blaze’s to wake him up. Help Blaze take revenge against the robots in this fast paced 2D platformer where you workout to level up.

name: Nature Escapes 4
description: Nature Escapes is back with another delightful assortment of enjoyable hidden object scenes!

name: Sunstone War
description: Harness Aztec bracelets, defend your village! Unique tower defense with epic freedom & diverse enemies. Unleash the Sunstone power now!

name: Astral Rot
description: Astral Rot is a fixed camera, survival horror sci-fi game by the co-creators of Tormented Souls. You play as Adler, a space mining engineer, that will have to face impossible choices in order to save his brother and anyone in the asteroid that hasn't been infected by the Stardust Disease.

name: With My Past
description: "How should I face my past in my ever-changing life? "Listen to her inner voice and solve these challenging puzzles to help her face her past self.

name: Hitchhike Wars
description: Hitchhike Wars is an adrenaline-fueled shooter game that combines high-speed hitchhiking, intense car combat and strategic weapon upgrades. Players embark on a thrilling journey, racing against time to hitch rides, unlock powerful weapons, and engage in PvP battles with other hitchhikers on the road.

name: Dark Galaxy
description: Dark Galaxy is an action based rogue-like top-down shooter. You pilot a space drone to oppose the insectoid like species called Minaripods and get stronger by travelling to different star systems. Can you free our galaxy from the invaders?

name: Bestial Reception
description: In the game "Bestial Reception" the strongest survives, grab a weapon and start running towards the enemy. Shoot and destroy everyone who happens to be near you. Get new more powerful weapons with the help of earned gold.

name: Dead Underworld
description: Embark on a dangerous odyssey through the Dead Underworld. Unleash potent weapons and unearth artifacts to conquer this unforgiving dungeon diving roguelike. Ally with others, forging bonds or exploiting friendships, or gain power among factions to survive in this desolated realm.

name: Wine and Spirits
description: Become a legendary bartender on a mystical train traversing battlefields across time, crafting extraordinary cocktails for fallen warriors. Explore exotic locations, mix unique ingredients, and embark on an immersive, dialogue-and-puzzle-based adventure in "Wine and Spirits."

name: Warbyte: Operation Falcon
description: An old-modern school fps, where you can play tactically, or engage in crazy fast-paced combat. Host your own rooms easily, and enjoy a fair game, where victory is determined by your skill.

name: Half Sword
description: Half Sword is a physics-based medieval combat simulator featuring historically accurate XV-century arms and armor.

name: Bot Crisis
description: A funny 3D online game where you must identify real players from a group of bots. Don't forget to act as a bot yourself!

name: Love in the Dark
description: In this multiplayer horror game, a loving couple receives an invitation from a wealthy man for an event. Despite my concerns, she insists on going. To protect her, I decide to secretly join and keep her safe.

name: Preserve
description: Preserve is a relaxing puzzle nature-building game in which you flourish a vibrant ecosystem by cleverly placing plants and animals to create a perfect symbiosis to your liking.

name: Hoptix
description: Hoptix is a movement playground game where style and speed come easy! Play as Rocket, a cyborg rabbit who is as cute as they are radical. Explore, race, and stunt on rollercoasters and skateparks in idyllic spaces. Share footage of your movement style with your friends.

name: Arcade FC
description: Arcade FC is an arcade soccer game with skill-based gameplay, fast-paced graphics, responsive controls, accurate ball physics and that retro vibe.

name: Mindbug Online
description: Summon hybrid creatures and send them to battle against your opponent. But be careful: your opponent may use one of their Mindbugs to take control of it. Outwit your opponent in a fascinating tactical duel in which having the best cards and playing them at the wrong time can be deadly for yourself.

name: Roboom
description: Ascend into the Robocon Universe! Roboom is an arena shooter roguelite where you blast through hordes of unique enemies and bosses. Are you ready to face the challenges of the Robocon War and rise to become the best in the Multiverse?

name: Alvara
description:
Forge your destiny!
Every choice shapes the adventure in this turn-based narrative RPG. Forge strong relationships, influence the story and recruit allies whose power depends on their affections. Craft, potion, explore, dominate. Alvara: Choices and alliances chart your course!

name: Neural Construct
description: Neural Construct is a free, online, educational and a chaotic party game in which you design and construct your own neural network to compete with other players and score points. Quickly adapt and overcome any obstacle to win.

name: 666 Second Rule
description: 666 Second Rule is an action game where you take a role of a tormented parent battling relentless insects. Utilize dark powers to fend off their disturbing attempts to crawl into the baby's head. Embrace the darkness within and prepare for an intense and gritty showdown.

name: Bridge Crossing
description: In a troubled period of war, help the shepherd to cross the bridge in search of the lost sheep.

name: The North Woods
description: The North Woods is a single player horror game in which you take on the role of a police officer, responding to a call, all the while looking through the view of his bodycam.

name: Keyboard Maestro Voyage
description: "Keyboard Maestro Voyage" is a music game using a MIDI keyboard, simulating real performances. Play in sync with flowing notes in this classic-style game. Start quickly by simply choosing a song and sheet music.

name: Landraisers
description: Explore the seas, loot islands, and slay bosses - all in the name of creating your own dream island!

name: Frontier of Madness
description: Join forces with friends in a thrilling multiplayer survival experience. Battle nightmarish creatures, construct resilient camps, and unravel the mysteries of a twisted world. But tread carefully, as the encroaching darkness tests your sanity. Will you survive together or succumb to madness?

name: Cosmo Rider
description: Conquer the universe and defend humanity in space on your upgradable Rider ship. Fight unknown creatures and entities in this rogue-lite top-down action game. Ride the Cosmos!

name: Mighty Slap
description: Mighty Slap is a Player vs Player Turn Based slapping game. Time your slap with a time based bonus multiplier to land a powerful slap to your opponent. First player to knock out the opponent wins.

name: Revenge of Chickens
description: Play as a rooster that wants to get revenge from humans and try to rescue chickens!

name: The Divine Speaker: A Bounty Hunter's First Christmas
description: A Chistmas themed afterstory to The Divine Speaker featuring Leos and Raen! Search for the elusive Mister Bells, spend the Winter Solstice together, and win at rock-paper-scissors against your favorite ex-assassin turned bounty hunter!

name: Merge Adventure: Magic Dragons
description: Merge dragons and magic to solve hard puzzles by playing merge games.

name: Geode Climb
description: Control the Geode Climbers born in the underground and aim for the surface in this jumping action game. You can only jump. Control the direction and strength to climb up.

name: Hero's Journey
description: Hero's Journey is a low poly style light rogue game. Players play the role of medieval warriors, defeat monsters and survive!

name: Last Spartan: Glory Over Madness
description:
In this deck-building roguelike, you'll customize and build your own dice set to use in turn-based battles as you explore a dark, randomly generated world, full of new enemies and encounters on every run. Experience a story-driven campaign! Fight for your Sanity and defeat the Lovecraftian horrors.

Last Spartan sees you playing as the titular Last Spartan as you battle through a story-driven randomly generated campaign where keeping a grip on your waning sanity becomes increasingly difficult as you do battle with more and more enemies that draw inspiration from Greek mythology and the Lovecraft mythos.

It's a roguelike with deck-building elements. The unique part here is that your deck is actually a set of customisable dices, with each face acting as a slot for a different ability. There are over 700+ dice faces to discover, allowing you to develop and learn numerous synergies to suit your preferred playstyle, especially when god selection comes into play.

Aside from the dice, you will be accompanied on each run by an ally Greek god. There are over 10 of them currently, although they won't all be unlocked immediately, and each provides distinct active and passive abilities. With them, you can develop different strategies for dealing with the many foes you encounter.

According to the developer, for the first ten hours, you will face new enemies on every run, with over 100 regular enemies and 20-plus mini-bosses to discover and fight in turn-based combat. This should keep the game feeling fresh and surprising for far longer than other entries in the genre.

The same applies to encounters with over 200 NPCs to meet and choices surrounding them to make. Depending on your interaction, they might provide you with a reward, blessings, or even curses that will remain constant until the end of that particular run.

Some of those NPCs will make their way to your city. It's here where you respawn after dying and spend resources you've gathered throughout each run to upgrade the various buildings in a bid to rebuild Sparta. This is the more permanent side of the Last Spartan game and will eventually provide you with perks that increase your chance of completing a run and progressing the overarching story.

The indie game Last Spartan is set to come out in early access on PC/Mac/Linux via Steam in February-March 2024 and full release coming to all Platforms and major storefronts by April 2024 ( Coming to PC/Mac/Linux first and then to all major consoles like Xbox & Playstation & Nintendo Switch & IOS soon after PC and console release )

name: Star Armada
description: Embark on a thrilling spaceship auto-battler adventure in Star Armada a strategic space combat game where you build, customize, and command your ultimate fleet of capital spaceships, unlocking new upgrades and abilities to help you survive against your enemies.

name: Kero
description: Kero is a third person collecting frog game where the player can explore the Rana archipelago, where tons of frogs live and participate in the KeroFest, a big hunt contest !

name: Pan's Survivor Chess
description: This is a auto-battler & vampire-suvivor like game.

name: Botsu: Ridiculous Robots
description: Fight your friends in hilarious sandbox sports: Boxball, Sumo Survival, and Stockpile. Wrestle your way to victory online or split-screen in unique matches. Unlock outrageous outfits and pull off awesome moves to flex your skills!

name: Legends of Savvarah: Children of the Sun
description: A fantasy interactive story (visual novel) where the mysteries of ancient gods, enigmas of bygone eras, magic, and the complex relationships between various beings are intricately woven together.

name: Forest of Strays
description: Forest of Strays is a hardcore platformer with many dangers scattered across the stages. Try and retry to complete every level while collecting every leaf along the way, fighting enemies, evading traps and getting trough very precise jumps! Will the lost girl find her cat and return back home?

name: Cosmic Roads
description: Do you think you can complete the roads mysteriously built in outer space? It is time to put your driving skills to the test in this difficult game that requires skills, patience and perseverance. Put on the mantle of a cosmic rider and complete the beautiful roads in outer space.

name: Kinlings
description: Craft your tale in a whimsical fantasy world. Shape a charming city, fulfill Kinlings' needs, and watch their unique stories unfold. Explore, quest, farm, and build. Experience the enchantment of Kinlings.

name: Revenguard
description: Evil creatures took your dog! They have taken over the kingdom and are threatening all the inhabitants. Can you pass the obstacles, uncover all the secrets and save them?

name: RoadPipe
description: Rotate, Connect, Help the car reach its destination! Explore the minimalistic stage with various gimmicks.

name: Fight! Olyn Island
description: Explore the mysterious Olyn Island! Play against other players and use cute animal heroes towards victory!

name: Lost: Antinomy
description: With just a swipe to the left or right, you can make all kinds of decisions. So, please embark on your own unique adventure tale through the continent of Astra!

name: Blessed Burden
description: A horror adventure with platforming elements in which you play the last surviving priest in a religious apocalypse.

name: Dojo Masters
description: Dojo Masters is a 2-button martial arts indie fighting game. Battle against your friends or head online to challenge warriors from around the world!

name: Bomber Party
description: Experience an explosive and nerve-wracking adventure! Eliminate other players, strategically use bombs, collect power-ups, and survive to earn trophies. The first player to reach the required number of trophies wins the game. Are you ready to triumph as the last survivor? Let's go!

name: Toy Racer Turbo Wheels: Playground Zone
description: Join the thrilling fun in Toy Racer Turbo Wheels: Playground Zone! Race adorable toy cars in a vibrant playground setting, speed through loops, ramps, and obstacles, and experience fast-paced challenges. Test your skills, upgrade your cars, and reign supreme in this miniaturized racing adventure!

name: Karnal
description: Outnumbered, outgunned, and alone, your only objective is to find your wife. Traverse horrific facilities, city streets, and apartment buildings while fighting various kinds of enemies in this old-school shooter.

name: Plunged
description: Plunged is a casual, first-person single-player 3D-Platformer where you use your plunger and rope to climb to the top.

name: Chaos Pattern
description: Chaos Pattern is an Action/Strategy hybrid game, with a visual blend of modern lighting and retro looks.

name: Rescue Team 911 Simulator: Ambulance, Police, Firefighter
description: Where Heroes Rise and Hope is Restored: Rescue Team in Action!

name: Drum Roll
description: Have you ever wanted to roll an oil drum? Roll the drum as far as you want with Drum Roll!

name: Motel Simulator: Create, Renovate & Grow Business
description: Motel Simulator is a game that allows you to become the manager of your own motel! Decorate the interior, rent out rooms, expand, and collect profits. Develop marketing strategies to attract diverse guests. Fulfill their requests and offer various services to keep your motel successful and popular.

name: Last Resort
description: Dive into the mysterious world of the "Last Resort", a non-linear visual novel where past and future are woven together. His life’s breaking under the weight of life problems. Unable to fight any further, He decides to take his final journey. Will it change anything? Or will it lead Him to the end?

name: Car Mechanic Simulator 2021: China
description: Have you ever dreamed of driving classic Chinese cars? The ones that are filled with passion and fascination? Or perhaps it's a newfound desire for you? Whatever the reason, now is the perfect time to start your Chinese adventure!

name: Warlords Battlecry: The Protectors of Etheria
description: A terrible threat long foretold rises to finish a war waged in prehistory, throwing Etheria into chaos. Will you save or lose your kindred? In this successor-in-the-making to the RPG/RTS Warlords Battlecry, interact with the world and discover myriad new tactics to dominate the battlefield.

name: Frame of Mind: A game of Thoughts
description: Frame of Mind is a brief and cozy narrative game that lets you discover a character trough thoughts and mementos they find while moving out of their parents home. It's an introspective game, meant to share some experiences a peer-group of neurodivergent queers, including the developer, had growing up.

name: The Endgame
description: True sandbox hack'n'slash entirely focused on endgame. Slay hordes of monsters in the most spectacular way and with extreme speed. Collect countless items, materials or cosmetics and take part in living economy.

name: Candles
description: Candles is a top-down, atmospheric horror game where you collect candles scattered throughout a house to perform a sealing ritual on a demon before it gets to you first. Explore the house, find the candles, solve puzzles, and outmanoeuvre the demon to escape.

name: Lykia: The Lost Island
description: From the producers of Pets Rescue and Alpharay comes their biggest 8-bit production yet! Lykia is an epic quest for the C64 and expanded C16 + Plus/4 that spans 4 disk-sides! The beautifully presented adventure features lots of characters to interact with as you help Nora on her magical quest to find the lost island.

name: Lost Eidolons: Veil of the Witch
description: From the world of "Lost Eidolons" comes an all-new turn-based strategy RPG. Stranded on a mysterious island with scattered memories, your only means of survival is to fight. Recruit allies, undertake a perilous journey, and battle to reclaim what you've lost... no matter how many deaths it takes.

name: Pixel Gun 3D: PC Edition
description: Pixel Gun 3D is a near complete PC port of a legendary multiplayer FPS with blocky and colorful graphics. Fight in multiple game modes, unlock dozens of maps and collect more than 1500 unique guns

name: Cleric and Goblins
description: "Cleric and Goblins" is a VR action game where you rescue a Cleric from a dungeon filled with goblins. The procedurally generated dungeons offer infinite adventures, while the physics-based combat system provides engaging battles.

name: Spy Cats
description: A 2D platforming adventure where you play as a cat on a mission to find hidden secrets as part of the Spy Cats Agency. Use gadgets to sneak through each mission, retrieve the artifact, and make a successful escape.

name: Five Days of Hell
description: A survival game in which you have to explore a desert canyon, face anomalies and various monsters.

name: The Farming Frontier
description: The Farming Frontier is a tranquil wilderness RPG, that delivers a farming simulation. Within this realm, you can cultivate crops, cut wood, catch fish, mine, and build amid wild landscapes. Reclaim your village, and confront adversaries in this tranquil wilderness RPG.

name: World War 2: WW2 Strategy Games
description: A World War II themed turn-based war chess game. You will play a commander during World War II, directing your troops to complete various tasks. You have the opportunity to reproduce every historical battle, command the ace generals and elite troops in history to win the victory!

name: Spellslinger
description: Spellslinger is a Strategy RPG Word Game. Spell words from a 4x4 tile grid to defeat enemies. Use strategic synergies of Spells and Artefacts to exploit weaknesses and defeat even the most powerful of foes. Explore a world with multiple unique areas on your quest to defeat The Dark One.

name: Q2 Humanity
description: he smash hit game “Q REMASTERED”, which became extremely popular amongst users in Japan in early 2023, is now coming back! "Q2 HUMANITY" is finally available as Early Access! In "Q2" the sequel to "Q1" you can play as a character yourself. You can fly, jump, run, draw, grab, throw, and so on.

name: Geko: In Search of the Big Fly
description: Geko is a friendly gecko with a delightful goal: catching the big fly to ensure a delicious meal! To help him on this thrilling adventure, you'll jump, climb platforms, dodge obstacles, and defeat enemies that appear along the way.

name: Dungeon Heroes
description: An action-packed local co-op multiplayer dungeon crawler with a 3D cel-shaded art style.

name: Eldrimar: The Card Game
description: Eldrimar: The Card Game is a card-based roguelike where you take on the role of the warlord Saron and participate in all significant battles for the kingdom of Eldrimar.

name: Puppets' Dream TD
description: On the night I saved the world, I died. A tower defense game in which the main character travels through the world after his death. Collect characters and items, organize your party, and find out the mysteries hidden in the world.

name: Long Way
description: Long Way is an immersive arcade driving simulator with diverse vehicles and customization. Driving different type of vehicles with trailers, various landscapes, and weather conditions. Impressive graphics, dynamic time, and challenges enhance immersion. Multiplayer support for up to 8 friends.

name: Tactical Zone
description: Welcome to the Tactical Zone world! This thrilling third-person shooter will give you adrenaline and unforgettable moments of battle on the battlefield. Enter the battlefield and take on the challenge of team play, where your cohesion and tactical skills will be the key to victory.

name: Medice To Arms
description: Medice To Arms is a PvP 2D battle game where you strategically arrange organs to harness power and avoid attacks from your opponent.

name: The Legend of Ogorets 1: Wrat
description: An immersive, barebones-style interactive visual novel with choices, lore, and endgames. Not for heroes.

name: The Legend of Ogorets 2: Tsundere
description: An interactive visual novel with choices, lore, and endgames. Do not read in the dark.

name: Wrong Landing
description: Wrong Landing is survival open world story horror game where you shipwracked on a deserted island and try to survive.

name: Labyrinthum
description: Labyrinthum is an exciting maze game that offers a unique gaming experience combining puzzles, riddles, and general knowledge challenges.

name: Distant Worlds 2: Factions - Quameno and Gizureans
description: The Galaxy Expands. The second Distant Worlds 2 expansion brings two new playable factions – the introverted puzzle-solving Quameno and the numberless and ruthless Gizureans.

name: Spirit X Strike
description: An Action Adventure Game that lets you craft unique COMBOs and explore endless ways to style on your enemies with a high-speed combat system. Test your skills in fun chaotic one-vs-group battles, intense, strategic duels, and exhilarating post-apocalyptic adventure that will set your blood boiling.

name: CaS-Puz: Camera Surface Puzzle
description: Your perspective changes the world. In this hardcore platformer, the existence of walls depends on the angle of your camera. A seemingly impassable level will transform once you look from a different angle, and every careless jump and camera movement can turn into a flight into the void.

name: Gears of Dragoon: Fragments of a New Era
description: Join a young explorer delving into the labyrinth beneath Carnas, a city pulsating with magic yet whispering of a mechanical past. As echoes of a bygone era stir, the ancient gears of fate rumble awake.

name: Mystical Riddles: Ship From Beyond - Collector's Edition
description: All hands on deck! A strange, oily fog has enveloped the waterfront of the port town of Quietcape, where local fishermen go, never to return again... Can you solve this mystery?
